T11dhnyabpu:84: tacca vyutpattayātmakaṃ samyagjñānapratipādanamanena kriyata iti prakaraṇamidaṃ tasyārthasya sādhanaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:90: sa ca sādhya sādhanalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇa eva |
T11dhnyabpu:92: sādhanaṃ, phalaṃ ca sādhyamḥ prakāṇaṃ kāraṇam, phalaṃ ca kāryamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:94: athaivaṃ sthite 'pi, yadi kaścit pṛcchati- ko 'rthaḥ

T11dhnyabpu:124: arthakriyāyāṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ tadabhrāntam, tadeva ca samyagjñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:126: iṣṭaśca prakaraṇārambhaḥ sautrāntikaḥ yogācārobhayanayānu abhidheyaṃ tu yadi nipprayojanaṃ syāt, tadā tatpratipattaye śabdasandarbho 'pi nārambhaṇīyaḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:127: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā
T11dhnyabpu:129: yasmāt samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ, tasmāt tatpratipattaye idamārabhayate- ityayamatra vākyārthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:130: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samaygjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanamuktam
T11dhnyabpu:132: tathā hi- 'puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyamanena prakaraṇena' iti bruvatā samyagjñānamaraya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
T11dhnyabpu:133: tadvayutpādanaṃ prayojanam, prakaraṇaṃ cedamupāyo vyutpādanasya- ityukta bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:135: na tvidamekaṃ vākayaṃ sambandham, abhidheyaṃ, prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham |
T11dhnyabpu:136: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sākṣāt sāmarthyād darśayati
T11dhnyabpu:144: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅga tathā
T11dhnyabpu:145: samvandhādīnyapi, atastāni kimiti na kathyante? ityāha- asminniti |
T11dhnyabpu:146: asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyāt kathitāni bhavantītyarhtaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:150: abhidheyaprayojanameva sakṣād vācyatayā nirdiśyate, abhidheyādīni tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā |
T11dhnyabpu:153: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣāchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati- na tvidamityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:154: ekaṃ tvittyādivākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasambandhārthatrayaṃ pratipadayati tatra tadityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:161: yasmāt kāraṇaṃ pūrva kāryasya, tasmāt tat pūrvamityucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:168: sarva iti sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭa laukika lokottara heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:173: heyaḥ aniṣṭaḥ, ahi kaṇṭaka viṣa śūlādilakṣaṇaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:174: upādeya iṣṭaḥ, strak candana vasanāśana tatra tad ityābhidheyam, vyutpādyate iti prayojanapadam
T11dhnyabpu:175: | prayojane cātra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate, śrotuśca śravaṇavyāpārasya |
T11dhnyabpu:176: tathā hi- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanamanviṣya pravartante |
T11dhnyabpu:177: tataścācāryeṇa prakaraṇe kimartha kṛtam, śrotṛbhiśca kimartha śrūyate?-
T11dhnyabpu:179: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānāmātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartu prakaraṇamidaṃ kṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:180: śiṣyaiścācāryaprayuktāmātmano vyutpattimiccadbhiḥ prakaraṇamidaṃ śrūyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇa śravaṇayo prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
T11dhnyabpu:183: vyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktum kimiti atdvayutpādyate iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:186: vakturiti śāstrakartu śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vintyate |
T11dhnyabpu:187: yasmād dvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇāsyo vyāpārau staḥ, kimiti punastayoḥ karaṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ cintyate?
T11dhnyabpu:190: yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayate ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam |
T11dhnyabpu:191: tacca vyutpattikaraṇa śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam |
T11dhnyabpu:192: yasmāt samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānān śiṣyān prerayati- vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvam iti |
T11dhnyabpu:194: tasmād vaktureva karaṇavyāpārasya prayojana vyutpādanam, na bhājanādīnām |
T11dhnyabpu:195: yadyapi tairvinā vyutpādanaṃ na bavati, tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt
T11dhnyabpu:197: yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ
T11dhnyabpu:198: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
T11dhnyabpu:200: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt, śiṣyāṇāṃ śravaṇavyāpāraśca |
T11dhnyabpu:201: yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:205: pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati
T11dhnyabpu:207: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti |
T11dhnyabpu:208: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante, tat kimetairārambhapradeśa uktaiḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:209: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante |
T11dhnyabpu:210: ukteṣu tvapramāṇakeṣvapi abhidheyādiṣu saṃśaya utpadyate, saṃśayācca pravartante |
T11dhnyabpu:217: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam |
T11dhnyabpu:218: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam? ityāha- sambandhapradarśanapadaṃ tvityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:219: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam |
T11dhnyabpu:220: upāyopeyasambandhaśca kāryakāraṇasambandha eva, sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:224: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:225: evaṃ manyate- yo hi prāmāṇikaḥ, sa pramāṇe pravartate |

T11dhnyabpu:237: yata evādivākye nārthasaṃśayaḥ, saṃśayācca pravṛtiḥ, ataeva śāstrakāreṇaiva sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiriti sarvapuruṣārthasādhakam |
T11dhnyabpu:239: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam |
T11dhnyabpu:240: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate |
T11dhnyabpu:241: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:249: mātṛvivāhakramopadeśavat, ato vā prakaraṇāllaghutara upāyaḥ prayojanasya,
T11dhnyabpu:251: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante |
T11dhnyabpu:252: abhidheyādiṣu tūkteṣvathasambhāvanā anarthasambhāvanāviruddhā utpadyate, tathā prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante |
T11dhnyabpu:253: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam
T11dhnyabpu:256: eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti, tat pratyuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:257: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti, mahatā prabandhena śāstrakaraṇāt sambhāvyata ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:258: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena? ityāha-
T11dhnyabpu:260: evaṃ manyate- yo hyamūḍhaḥ, taṃ prati na kartavyameva |
T11dhnyabpu:264: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate, tataḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:266: | ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya
T11dhnyabpu:268: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha-
T11dhnyabpu:270: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam, arthadarśanaṃ ca cārvākopakalpitam, athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena, tannirastaṃ sarvam, eteṣāṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇābhāvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:271: yathā na ca tāni samyagjñānāni, tathā svayaṃ ṭīkāyāmapahastitāni |
T11dhnyabpu:274: tena yasmāt sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau samyagjñānaṃ pūrvabhāvi, tasmādeva tad vyutpādyata
T11dhnyabpu:280: artha prāpayati, api tvarthe puruṣaṃ pravartayat prāpayatyartham |
T11dhnyabpu:282: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:286: tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:288: yenaiva hi jñānena prathamamadhigato 'rthaḥ, tenaiva pravartita pruruṣaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:290: tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam |
T11dhnyabpu:293: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:295: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa, tannirākartu māha, pradarśite cārtha ityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:296: pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam, tṛtīyamapi tatraivarthe prāpakam, tato nādyādadhikaṃ prāpaṇayogyīkaraṇeneti tadeva pramāṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:301: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
T11dhnyabpu:302: pravṛttiviṣayayogyī karotītyarthaḥ, na tu dvitīyaṃ jñānam, ādayenaiva pravṛttiviṣayayogyīkṛtatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:305: kuto 'yaṃ labhyate yadā prathamaṃ darśayatyeva, na pravartayati na prāpayati, dvitīyamapi
T11dhnyabpu:309: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare
T11dhnyabpu:310: pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ, tatrārthe tāvanna pramāṇavyāpāraparisamāptirityāha- adhigata ityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:311: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam,
T11dhnyabpu:313: kathaṃ samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ ko vāsau? ityāha- ata eveti |
T11dhnyabpu:315: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti |
T11dhnyabpu:316: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt |
T11dhnyabpu:319: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:327: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ, yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:329: na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:336: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra yo 'rtha ityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:342: bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:345: tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:346: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:348: tadanumānaṃ viśiṣṭasambandhena yadudeti jñānam, yathā atratyo dhūmo
T11dhnyabpu:351: pratyakṣasyasvaviṣayaniścayajananavyāpāro 'bhinnaḥ, anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti |
T11dhnyabpu:352: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati |
T11dhnyabpu:353: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni |
T11dhnyabpu:355: yathaite pramāṇe, saśayādijñānaṃ na tathā pramāṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:357: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake, na tathā saṃśayaviparyayajñāneḥ tathabhūtasyārthasyā bhāvāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:358: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:360: tasmādaśakyaprāpaṇam- atyantaviparītam, bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:372: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha |
T11dhnyabpu:373: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau |
T11dhnyabpu:374: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:375: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
T11dhnyabpu:376: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati? na tāvat pratyakṣam, tatra jalasya parokṣatvāt nāpyanumānam, liṅgābhāvāt nāpi saṃśayarūpam, ubhayāṃśābhāvāt nāpi viparītam, viparītārthābhāvāt? ityāśaṅkayāha- sarveṇa cāliṅgajenetyādi evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate, yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam, niyatārthāpariccedāt tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam, tat saṃśayajñānamevetyapramāṇam
T11dhnyabpu:377: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam
T11dhnyabpu:378: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti, kiṃ tāni na vyutpādayante? ityāha- arthakriyārthibhiścetyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:380: nanu ca yadapyupadarśitārthaprāpaṇāt pramāṇaṃ samyagjñānam, śuklaśaṅkhe
T11dhnyabpu:381: pītajñānam, kuñcikāvivare maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇijñānam, ardharatre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:382: nanu ca deśaniyatam, ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu
T11dhnyabpu:383: pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum? nocyate- yasminneva kāle pariccidayate tasminneva kāle prāpayitavyamiti, ayo hi darśanakālaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:384: anyaśca prāptikālaḥ, kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam |
T11dhnyabpu:388: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta |
T11dhnyabpu:390: dvividhaṃ ca samyagjñānam, arthakriyānirbhāsam, arthakriyāasmarthe ca pravartakam |
T11dhnyabpu:395: pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam, smaraṇādabhilāṣaḥ abhilāṣāt pravṛttiḥ, pravatteśca prāptiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:404: yadayapyetānyabhrāntagrahaṇasya vyāvarttyāni tatraivābhrāntagrahaṇaprastāve darśayitavyāni, tathāpīha samyajñānavyāvartyaprastāvāt kathitānītyadoṣaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:406: evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ
T11dhnyabpu:408: tvanyakālasya, niyata kālasya cāprāpteḥ kṣaṇikatvāda bhagavānām |
T11dhnyabpu:409: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ, atha ca kālabhede 'pi prāmāṇyam, tathā svapanajñānasyārtharātropadarśitaṃ madhyāhnakālaputraprāpaṇasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:410: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno
T11dhnyabpu:411: bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate, api tu santānāpekṣayā |
T11dhnyabpu:412: tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena, sa eva tena prāpitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:414: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:418: sa ca hetuhetusadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavati, yadi santānāpekṣayā prāmāṇyamavatiṣṭhate, na alkṣaṇāpekṣayeti
T11dhnyabpu:422: kāraṇaśabda eva kasmānnakṛtaḥ? ityāha- kāraṇaśabda ityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:423: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam |
T11dhnyabpu:424: yatraiva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ, yat parīkṣyate |
T11dhnyabpu:425: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ, tena tatra na
T11dhnyabpu:428: tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:430: arthyate iti arthaḥ, kāmyate iti yāvat |
T11dhnyabpu:435: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati, yadapekṣayā vyavahitasya grahaṇārtha
T11dhnyabpu:437: nanu kimucyate arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ jñānamanantaraṃ kāraṇam, nahi tat kāraṇajñānam, evaṃm tuyujyate vaktum- yat sādhananirbhāsyanantaraṃ jñānamarthakriyānirbhāsajñānamupajanayati, tat
T11dhnyabpu:441: nirbhāsaḥ= pratibimbanam, tadākārajñānotpattiryasmādanantarajñānāt tat sādhanajñānam, tadarthakriyānirbhāsaṃ sādhanajñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:443: athavā- arthakriyājñānamevānantarakāraṇam, tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:444: yadyevama, anantarameva kimiti na parīkṣayate? ityāha- aytraiva hītyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:448: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham |
T11dhnyabpu:456: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,puruṣasya prayojanaṃ dārupākādi, tasya siddhirniṣpattiḥ iti |
T11dhnyabpu:458: samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi? svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ, sā samyagjñānapūrviketi na doṣaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:459: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti |
T11dhnyabpu:460: nanu ca heyopādeyāgbhyāmanyo 'pyupekṣaṇī'sti, tasya kimiti na kathanam?
T11dhnyabpu:471: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti |
T11dhnyabpu:473: tathā hi yadi pradarśitamartha prāpayati, evaṃ tato bhavatyarthasiddhiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:475: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato
T11dhnyabpu:478: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam |
T11dhnyabpu:479: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā
T11dhnyabpu:482: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:484: satyamasti, kintu tasyānupādeyatvād heyatvameveti na pṛthakkathanam |
T11dhnyabpu:485: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
T11dhnyabpu:486: upekṣaṇīyasya tadviparyamānna kathanam iti, tat pratyuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:490: kathamāśaṅkitam? natu sarvā hānopādānārthasiddhiḥ samyag, jñānādeva, api tu mithyājñānādapiv
T11dhnyabpu:494: tenāyamarthaḥ- sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ dviprakārā hānopādānārthasiddhilakṣaṇā, laukikalokottarārthasiddhilakṣaṇā samyagjñānanibandhanā bāhulyeneti |
T11dhnyabpu:496: draṣṭavyaḥ, kātsnrye varatte, sarva brahmaṇā sṛṣṭam iti, tenāyamarthaḥ-
T11dhnyabpu:497: yavattī kṛtsnārthasiddhirhānopādānalakṣaṇā, sarvā samyagjñānādeva, na mithyājñānādaprārthaptyasiddheriti
T11dhnyabpu:501: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:510: jñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ tasmāt tat samyagjñānaṃ vyupādayate |
T11dhnyabpu:511: yadayapi ca samāse guṇībhūtaṃ samyagjñānam, tathāpīha prakaraṇe vyutpādayitavyatvāt pradhānam, tatastasyaiva taccabdena sambandhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:514: caturvidhā cātra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa gocara phalaviṣayā |
T11dhnyabpu:519: nan bahubrīhiṇā puruṣārthasiddhirucyate, tasyāḥ prādhānyāt taccabdena
T11dhnyabpu:520: sambandho yukto na samyagjñanasya? ityāha- yadayapītyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:523: śabdāpekṣayā codayaṃ pratipādayāpekṣayā parihṛtam, smyagjñānasyaiva vyutpādayatayā prastutatvāditarasyāḥ siddhastadviparyayāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:528: nāpi doṣāpanayanam, na hayanena prakaraṇena doṣo
T11dhnyabpu:550: tasmāt tādṛśavipratipatticatuṣṭhayanirākaraṇena srvathā abhāntatayā samyagjñanasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:551: tatra ca prathamameva saṅkhayāvipratipattinirākaraṇārthamuktam- dvividhaṃ samyagjñānamiti
T11dhnyabpu:557: vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇamākhyātuṃ śakyam |
T11dhnyabpu:558: apradarśite tu vyaktibhede sakalavyaktyanuyāyi samyagjñānalakṣaṇamekaṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum |
T11dhnyabpu:560: apradarśite tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyāhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:565: prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgapratiṣedhāt abhidheyavalliṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:566: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāt tadbhedaḥ pradarśayitu
T11dhnyabpu:567: yujyate- ityambhutalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti, tat kimityādāveva pradarśitam? ityāha vyaktibhede cetyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:569: kintvatra saṃkhyābhede 'kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate
T11dhnyabpu:570: kathayitum, ataḥ pratyakṣasyānyallakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:571: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti nirdeśād dvividhamiti labdham, kimartha
T11dhnyabpu:574: asati dvitvakathane pratyakṣānumāne tāvat sambhavati'nyānyapi pramāṇāni bhaviṣyantīti syādāśaṅkā pratigatamakṣamityādinā gatisamāsaṃ darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:575: akṣamakṣaṃ prati pratyakṣamityavyayībhāvasamāsaḥ, kasmānna pradarśyate 'yaṃ samāsaḥ? yato
T11dhnyabpu:578: kodṛśaṃ ca dvaivivyam? kathaṃ na vā caturvidhaṃ jñānamiti? ataḥ viśeṣeṇoktam pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ceti |
T11dhnyabpu:584: tathātrāpi indriyāśritatvena jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvasūcanāt pratyakṣacatuṣṭhayameva pratyakṣatvenāśrīyate |
T11dhnyabpu:590: akṣāśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya, na tu pravṛttinimittam |
T11dhnyabpu:592: tadeva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam tataścayatkiñcidarśasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamucyate
T11dhnyabpu:595: yathā gaccatoti gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitamekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃpravṛttinimittī karoti |
T11dhnyabpu:596: yathā ca gaccatyagaccati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:602: pratyakṣasy, tataśva pratyakṣā buddhiḥ, pratyakṣo ghaṭaiti na syātḥ idameva syātpratyakṣājñānam, pratyakṣaṃ kuṇḍaṃ ceti |
T11dhnyabpu:604: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaividnriyajñanasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt, na
T11dhnyabpu:611: paścādityarthakathanaṃ kṛtam, na tasmin vākye samāsaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:617: yathā pratyakṣāmarthenotpannaṃ sad abhrāntamiti pramāṇaṃ bhavativ tathānumānamapi tādātmyadutpattibhyāmarthapratibandhādabhrāntamiti tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:618: etena yaduvata kaiścit- sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu mukhyaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:626: tena kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ yad bhavati tadeva pratyakṣaṃ viditavyam ityartha ukto bhavati
T11dhnyabpu:634: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyavalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduvataṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ- pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nānumānam, tathā coktaṃ mīsāṃsābhāsye- pratyakṣe valīyasi kathamanumānam
T11dhnyabpu:635: iti tat prayuktam yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatbam |
T11dhnyabpu:640: pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti bhinnavibhaktinirdeśo 'rthād viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:642: etaccāyuktam yasmād ekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyamāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi pratykṣatvajātyeti |
T11dhnyabpu:646: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandharūpaṃ pratyuktam
T11dhnyabpu:649: yadayapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārtha kathayitum, tathāpi na svarūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syat, yato 'nyadapi pratyakṣasya svarūpamartha avayavārthastu- kalpanābhya apoḍhamiti kalpanāpoḍham |
T11dhnyabpu:655: kasmād viśeṣaṇadvayamuktamiti ced? ucyate, timiravato bhrāntajñānavyaccedārtham abhrāntamityuktam
T11dhnyabpu:657: evamabhrāntatve tatra samudāyāt pratyakṣatvajātyaikadeśasya pṛthakkaraṇaṃ nirdhāraṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:659: yat tad bhavatām asmākaṃ cārtheṣu sākṣātkāri jñāni prasiddham, tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvayuktaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:660: na caitanmatavyam- kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvaṃ cedaprasiddham, kimanyat pratyakṣasya jñānasya rūpamavaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad
T11dhnyabpu:662: pratyakṣaśabda vācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham, tadanuvādena kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntatvavidhiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:664: lakṣyalakṣaṇetukathite yathārtha kathitaṃ bhavati yat kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntamiti pratipattavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:667: śabdamanūdayānityatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate, na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñā
T11dhnyabpu:670: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate, na tu lakṣaṇamanūdaya
T11dhnyabpu:672: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate, aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti |
T11dhnyabpu:674: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:675: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati, tataśca kathaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇamanūdya lakṣaṇaṃ vijñāpyate,
T11dhnyabpu:676: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate? ityāśaṅkyāha- yat tad bavatāmityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:677: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham, tathāpi arthasākṣātkāritvena sāmānyaṃ pratyakṣāṃ prasiddham, tato 'pyucyate- pratyakṣamanūdyeti |
T11dhnyabpu:684: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham |
T11dhnyabpu:690: etacca lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vipratipattinirāsārtham, na tvanumānanivṛttyarthamḥ yataḥ kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇenaivānumānaṃ vivartitam |
T11dhnyabpu:691: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:692: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:698: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:700: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti |
T11dhnyabpu:701: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā |
T11dhnyabpu:702: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:703: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham |
T11dhnyabpu:704: yadyevaṃ vyākhyāyate, ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:705: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam, iti yogācāramatenaḥ tadapyatrācāryeṇa saṃgṛhītamiti tadayuktam, yata ācāryeṇa vipratipattinirāsārtha padadvayaṃ kṛtam, na vyavaccedārtham ata evācāryamanumāpayatā dharmotatreṇa padadvayaṃ vyākhyāmiti |
T11dhnyabpu:706: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati? ityāha-

T11dhnyabpu:1090: avyavahitatvena, sa cāsau pratyayaśca hetutvāt samanantarapratyayaḥ, tena janitam |
T11dhnyabpu:1091: tadanenaikasantānāntarbhūtayoreva indriyajñāna manovijñānayojanyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti uktaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1093: yadā cendriyajñānaviṣayādanyo viṣayo manovijñānasya, tadā gṛhītagrahaṇādāsañjito 'prāmāṇyadoṣo nirastaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1097: tena janitamityādinetat kathayati- indriyavijñānena svaviṣayāntaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam |
T11dhnyabpu:1099: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yaccoditaṃ pareṇa tat parihṛtam
T11dhnyabpu:1100: | pūrvakṣaṇe indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya
T11dhnyabpu:1102: yadā cityādinā yaccodayaṃ kṛtam- yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣam, na syānmanovijñānasyendriyavijñānaviṣayādanyo
T11dhnyabpu:1104: vyavahitasya nīlādergrahaṇai bhavatu iti, tat parihṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:1105: yasmādindriyavijñānaviṣayasya dvitīyopādeyabhūtaviṣayakṣaṇo gṛhīto manovijñānaviṣayaḥ, tasmād vyavahitakṣaṇo viṣayo na bhavatyasyāndhavadhirādeścātīndriyavijñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:1107: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:1112: pratyakṣaśabdaviṣayameṣṭavyam, anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyāḥ ityasya vyaghātaḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1113: svaviṣayānantaraviṣayaśabdena śrotravijñānaviṣayānantarayogyaviṣayo gṛhyate, nopādeyakṣaṇa evaḥ tena
T11dhnyabpu:1114: vijñānaviṣayadeśe 'paraśbdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratykṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1116: kutaḥ? indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ, tadā indriyajñānenāgṛhītasya viṣayāntarasya
T11dhnyabpu:1119: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya |
T11dhnyabpu:1120: etacca siddhāntaprasiddhaṃ mānasaṃ pratyakṣam, na tvasya prasādhakamasti
T11dhnyabpu:1122: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti || etaccetyādinā manovijñanasyotpattiviṣayaṃ darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:1124: yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣaye notpadayateḥ indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1125: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam
T11dhnyabpu:1126: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti? ucyateḥ na mānasapratyakṣeṇāsmadvighānāmarthakriyāvāptirbhavati, api tu yogino
T11dhnyabpu:1128: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam
T11dhnyabpu:1129: atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kimiti mānasotpattilupyate? ityāha-
T11dhnyabpu:1132: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati, dvitīye kṣaṇe mānasaṃ bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:1135: vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate, dvitīye kṣaṇe yogyakaraṇe sati samānarūpam, tena tayoḥ kathamindriyavijñānavyapdeśo na syāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:1136: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet, tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti? ityaha- etacce tyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:1139: tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti, tad bhaṅgayāvadhāraṇādeva dūṣitam |
T11dhnyabpu:1140: terevaṃ vyakhyātam- vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi indriyajñānamtpadayate, mānasaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1153: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti, na bhinnendriyayoḥ, ṣaṇṇā yugapadutpattiḥ iti
T11dhnyabpu:1156: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt
T11dhnyabpu:1157: yadi ca tanna mānasaṃ syāt, tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī nīlavikalpo na syādeva |
T11dhnyabpu:1160: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati, tathendriyavijñānasantanayo bhinnatvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1163: atrocyate- yaduktaṃ tāvat samānajātīyavikalpodayāt iti, tatsaddhau yat sādhanaṃ tadanekāntikamḥ vijātīyādapyutpattidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyām |
T11dhnyabpu:1166: tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1167: na ca devadattayajñadattayoriva bhinnasantānavartitvaṃ savikalpakanirvikalpakayoḥ, yena bhinnasantānānnirvikalpakādutpattinaṃ syād, ekasantānapātitvāt tayoḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1168: avaśyaṃ cāṅgīkartavyā vikalpasyotpattiḥ, yena vārttikakāra evamāha-
T11dhnyabpu:1172: tataśca tatsāmarthyabhavi kathaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ smaraṇam? vijātīyatvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1173: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa, prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam, yadi svavyāpāraṃ karoti? svavyāpārastu svaviṣaye vikalpajanakatvaṃ nāma, tataśca vijātīyādapi vikalpasyodayāditi yat kiñcidetat || 9 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1174: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1177: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti |
T11dhnyabpu:1178: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati, svarūpaprakāśe ca pradīpāntaraṃ nāpekṣateḥ caittāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1180: svasaṃviditāḥ, nānyā cittāyasthā- itpetadāśaṅkānivṛttyartha sarvagrahaṇaṃ kṛttam |
T11dhnyabpu:1181: nāsti sā kācit cittāvasthā, yasyāmātmanaḥ saṃvedanaṃ na
T11dhnyabpu:1183: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam |
T11dhnyabpu:1184: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate |
T11dhnyabpu:1185: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1186: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta, syāt tadā tasya
T11dhnyabpu:1188: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam |
T11dhnyabpu:1190: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam |
T11dhnyabpu:1193: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1194: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1199: svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate, tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na
T11dhnyabpu:1201: na ca svātmani kāritvavirodhaḥ, yato vāstavakārakatvābhāvaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1203: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva |
T11dhnyabpu:1206: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:1207: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam |
T11dhnyabpu:1208: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate, taṃ pratyāha- iha ca
T11dhnyabpu:1210: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante |
T11dhnyabpu:1216: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1220: tacca jñānarūpadevadanamātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalpakam, abhrāntaṃ ca |
T11dhnyabpu:1231: evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca
T11dhnyabpu:1233: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:1239: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam |
T11dhnyabpu:1240: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti |
T11dhnyabpu:1251: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1258: yogaḥ= samādhiḥ, sa yeṣāmasti te yoginaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1260: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati
T11dhnyabpu:1261: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā, tadā nāsti prakarṣagatiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1262: tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1263: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam |
T11dhnyabpu:1265: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā |
T11dhnyabpu:1266: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam
T11dhnyabpu:1269: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati-
T11dhnyabpu:1270: bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā, prakarṣaparyantāvasthā dvitīyā, bhāvyamānasya karatalāmalakavad darśanaṃ yoginastṛtīyāvastheti |
T11dhnyabpu:1273: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt tadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:1274: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
T11dhnyabpu:1275: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati
T11dhnyabpu:1276: tadā sphuṭābhatvānnirvikalako 'yamityanaikantiko heturiti yaccoditaṃ pareṇa, tat parihatu
T11dhnyabpu:1282: atastadeva cidrūpaṃ jñānaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati, na vācya vācakākāratayāḥ tayorārapitarūpatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:1287: tadasannihitam tadā vividhavastuviṣayāṇi avibhramāṇyutpadyante, tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1288: jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1290: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād, bhūtagrahaviśeṣāviṣṭujñānavat |
T11dhnyabpu:1293: aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1294: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1295: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
T11dhnyabpu:1299: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante || 11 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1301: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1303: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat, tadvat pūrvavinaṣṭajñānamapi samprati nāsti vastunaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1310: yogaḥ= samādhiḥ, sa yasyāstīti yogī, tasya jñānaṃ pratyakṣam |
T11dhnyabpu:1319: ityasannihitaṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tad vastvāropya gṛhṇad vikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:1322: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvāt saṃvādakam
T11dhnyabpu:1328: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
T11dhnyabpu:1329: na tu sāmānyalakṣaṇam sāmānyasyāvastutvāt, pratyakṣeṇa ca vastusvarūpopalambhāt || 12 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1330: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:1331: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:1334: vastuno hyasādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvamasti sāmānyaṃ ca |
T11dhnyabpu:1336: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya- grāhyaśca yadākāramutpadyate, prāpaṇīyaśca yamadhyavasyati
T11dhnyabpu:1340: santāna eva ca pratyakṣasya prāpaṇīyaḥ, kṣaṇasya prāpayitumaśakyatvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1348: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakābidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣo dvāvapi viṣayakalpitau |
T11dhnyabpu:1350: sāṅkhayena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1351: vedāntavādinā ca sāmānyameva viṣayo dvayoḥ, ātmārdvatatayā sarvasyaikatvāda viśeṣe bhrāntatvāda dvayoriti vipratipattiḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1359: | etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam |
T11dhnyabpu:1360: sādhāraṇaṃ tu tattvamāropitaṃ rūpam pūrvāparakṣaṇā nāmabhedāvyavasāyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1361: ato vastuno rūpadvayam- asādhāraṇaṃ, sāmānyaṃ ca |
T11dhnyabpu:1362: tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1363: nanu kimucyate grāhyaviṣaya iti, yāvatā kimanyo viṣayo 'sti pratyakṣasya? astītyāha-
T11dhnyabpu:1366: yaṃ santānarūpeṇa sthitamartha tat pṛṣṭha bhāvina vikalpena vinścinoti |
T11dhnyabpu:1367: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya santāno viṣayaḥ, yato vikalpasyāsau viṣayaḥ? ucyate upacārāt
T11dhnyabpu:1368: pratyakṣavyāpāreṇa vikalpenādhyavaseyatayā viṣayīkṛtatvāt pratyakṣaviṣaya ityucyate upacārādityadoṣaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1372: svalakṣaṇaṃ ca kīdṛśamavagantavyamiti cet? tatrāha- yasyeti |
T11dhnyabpu:1379: gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇetvenāvasīyate yataḥ, tataḥ svalakṣaṇamavasitaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya
T11dhnyabpu:1381: tadatra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ || 12 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1382: kaḥ punarasau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavyaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:1386: sannidhānam nikaṭadeśāvasthānam, asannidhānam dūradeśāvasthānam, tasmāt sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyakārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām |
T11dhnyabpu:1390: tadanetyādinā pramāṇacintāyāṃ grāhyāviṣayadarśano 'yam, na prāpyaṃ viṣayamiti darśayati, grāhya eva viṣaye sarveṣāṃ vipratipatteḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:1393: viṣayaḥ ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadap svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1394: asannidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadeva sya vyākhyā dūṣitā |
T11dhnyabpu:1397: etadasaṅgatam yasmād vastunastatrābhāve jñānameva ha bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1401: na sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇam āropitarūpasya dūrāsannābhyāṃ sarvadavādphuṭatvāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:1402: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇam? ityāha- sarvāṇyevetyāhi
T11dhnyabpu:1405: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ rūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt, tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamaḥ-
T11dhnyabpu:1406: dūre 'spaṣṭam, nikaṭe spaṣṭamiti? ucyate na hi nolaṃ vastu spaṣṭarūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca, apitu nīlaṃ sādhyārthakriyāsamartha
T11dhnyabpu:1409: jñāne yo 'rthaḥ pratibhāsavailakṣaṇyaṃ karoti sa eva svalakṣaṇam || 13 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1410: astu paramārthadeva vastu pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ, kasmāt svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya
T11dhnyabpu:1418: yo hi jñānaviṣayaḥ sannihitaḥ san sphuṭābhāsaṃ jñānasya karoti,
T11dhnyabpu:1419: asannihitastu yogyadeśastha evāsphuṭaṃ karoti, tat svalakṣaṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:1420: sarvāṇyeva hi vastūni dūrāsphuṭāni dṛśyante, samīpe sphuṭāni |
T11dhnyabpu:1422: kasmāt punaḥ pratyakṣaviṣaya eva svalakṣaṇam, tathāhi vikalpaviṣayo 'pi
T11dhnyabpu:1426: ya evārthaḥ sannighānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sphuṭamasphuṭaṃ ca pratibhāsaṃ karoti paramārthasan sa eva |
T11dhnyabpu:1427: sa ca pratyakṣasya viṣayo yataḥ, tasmāt tadeva svalakṣaṇam || 14 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1430: yadā dūre nīlaṃ paśyati tadālokaparamāṇūnāṃ ca rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtatvāt spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñāna bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1431: nikaṭe tu ālokaparamāṇūnāṃ bahutvānna te rajaḥparamāṇubhirabhibhūtā iti spaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1432: jñānasya spaṣṭādvāreṇārthasya spaṣṭāspaṣṭarūpe bhavataḥ, na paramārthata iti |
T11dhnyabpu:1433: sāmānyasya tu jñānadvāreṇa na spaṣṭāspaṣṭarūpe, tena na tat svalakṣaṇam ||
T11dhnyabpu:1434: nanu tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam ityuktam, tatra yadi pratyakṣasyaiva viṣayo bhavati svalakṣaṇam, nānyasyeti, tadānumānādenaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ, kintu pratyakṣasyānyo viṣayasyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1436: tadānumānasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo na viṣiddha iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanumānaṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ pṛcchati- kasmāt punarityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1441: yadyapi vikalpasya viṣayo vastu na bhavati, tathāpi sa eva
T11dhnyabpu:1448: kasmāt svalakṣaṇameva paramārthasaditi cet? tatrāha artheti |
T11dhnyabpu:1458: evaṃ yadarthakriyāsamartha tadeva vastu iti svalakṣaṇenaivārthakriyā-
T11dhnyabpu:1465: pratyojanasya, kriyā niṣpattiḥ, tasyāṃ sāmarthya śaktiḥ, tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yasya vastunaḥ, tad arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇam, tasya bhāvastasmāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1470: tata eva hi pratyakṣaviṣayādartha kriyā prāpyate, na vikalpaviṣayāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1471: ata eva yadayapi vikalpaviṣayo dṛśya ivāvasīyate, tathāpi na sa dṛśya eva tato
T11dhnyabpu:1475: etasmāt svalakṣaṇāt yadanyat-svalakṣaṇaṃ yo na sarvasya
T11dhnyabpu:1481: sāmānyapi jñāne pratibhāsate, tadapi paramārthasaditi maḥyamānaḥ pṛccati- kasmāt punastadeva paramārthasaditi |
T11dhnyabpu:1483: tadayamatha ityādinā samudāyasya padānāṃ tātparya darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:1485: manyate- yasmādarśakriyāsamartha paramārthasat, tasmānna sāmānyaṃ paramārthasat, dāhādayarthakriyāyāmanupayogāt
T11dhnyabpu:1486: na ca pratibhāsavalāt tattvam asadrūpasyā pyavidayābalapratibhāsanāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1487: na ca jñānajanakatvenārthakriyākāritvam, tasya jñānasya vināpi sāmānyena vāsanābalāt sāmānyaiṣayotpatteriti etasmādityādinā anumānaviṣayaṃ darśayati |
T11dhnyabpu:1492: yasyāryasya sannidhāne 'pi ca jñānamekarūameva bhavati iti || 16 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1497: tathā hi- anna svalakṣaṇābhidhānāvasare avataraṇena tadviparītalakṣaṇasya jñānaṃ sukaramiti sāmānyalakṣaṇamuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:1503: tasya samāropitasya sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya na bhedaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1514: sāmānyalakṣaṇamanumānasya viṣayaṃ vyakhyātukāmenāyaṃ svalakṣaṇasvarūpākhyānagranthaḥ āvatanīyaḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1517: kathaṃ punarvikalpasya viṣayo bhavati sāmānyam? ityāha- samāropyamāṇamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:1521: atrāpi grāhyāpekṣayā viṣayo vyavasthāpitaḥ, na prāpyāpekṣayā tatrāviprattipatteḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1522: nanu sāmānyamiti npuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prastutya sa ityanena puṃllige parāmarśaḥ katham? ityāha- sarvanāmna ityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:1523: kasmāt punaḥ pratyakṣaparicceda anumānasya viṣayavipratipattinirākṛtā vārtikakāreṇa, nānumānapariccede? ityāha- sāmānyalakṣaṇamityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:1530: ayaṃ cāsya sambandhaḥ- yadi pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvamiṣṭaṃ tarhi rūpādiprameyaparīkṣaṇalakṣaṇena pramāṇaphalena bhavitavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:1531: yathā kuṭhārikayā vṛkṣādicedane dvikhaṇḍīkaraṇaṃ phalaṃ dṛśyate, ityata āha-
T11dhnyabpu:1533: tadeva pratyakṣajñānaṃ pramāṇaphalam, pratyakṣāt pratyakṣajñānādatirikataṃ phalaṃ nāstīti viṣayavipratipatti nirākṛtya phalavipratipatti nirākartumāha- tadeveti |
T11dhnyabpu:1534: yadevānantaramuktaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva pramāṇasya phalam || 18 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1535: yadayanumānapariccede 'numānasya viṣayo vyavasthāpyeta tadā tatraivaṃ granthaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt
T11dhnyabpu:1542: | tathā hi- pramāṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ pramitikriyāṃ vinā na bhavati, yathā- cittiṃ vinā na paraśuḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1543: tataśca pramāṇāt kāraṇāt pṛthaka phalenārthasampravṛttilakṣaṇena bhavitavyam svātmani kriyākaraṇatvavirodhāt
T11dhnyabpu:1545: ato mīmāṃsakena indriyaṃ pramāṇamindriyārthasannikarṣaḥ, mana indriyasannikarṣaḥ, ātmana sannikarṣaśceṣṭaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1548: yadvendriyaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt tasya cārthena saṅgatiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1549: manaso vindriyairyoga ātmanā sarva eva vā ||
T11dhnyabpu:1551: tadā jñāna phalaṃ tatra vyāpārācca pramāṇatā |
T11dhnyabpu:1552: vyāpāro na yadā teṣāṃ tadā notpadayate phalam ||
T11dhnyabpu:1553: thā pūrva pūrva pramāṇam, uttaramuttaraṃ phalamiti coktam |
T11dhnyabpu:1555: tathā naiyāyikādayo pyevabhūtameva pramāṇaphalabhiccanti, idaṃ tvadhikam-
T11dhnyabpu:1562: tadasti yasya pratyakṣasya tadeva arthapratītirūpam, tasya bhāvaḥ arthapratītirūpatvam, tasmāt arthapratītirūpatvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1564: arthasya pratītiḥ avagamaḥ, saiva rūpa yasya pratyakṣajñānasya tadarthapratītirūpam, tasya bhāvastasmāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1566: prāpaṇaśaktiśca na kevalā darthāvinābhāvitvād bhavatiḥ bījādayavinābhāvino 'pyaṃkurādraprāpakatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:1567: tasmāt prāpyādarthād utpattāvapyasya jñānasyāsti kaścidavaśyakartavyaḥ prāpakavyāpāro yena kṛtenārthaḥ prāpito bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1568: sa eva ca pramāṇaphalam yadanuṣṭhānāt prāpakaṃ bhavati jñānam |
T11dhnyabpu:1569: uktaṃ ca purastāt- pravṛttiviṣayapradarśanameva prāpakasya vyāpāro nāma |
T11dhnyabpu:1577: evaṃ manyate- yena phalena niṣpannenānantareṇa pramāṇasya karaṇatvavyapadeśo bhavati tadeva
T11dhnyabpu:1579: arthapariccedakatvena vijñāna utpanne svaviṣayaniścayajanakatve sati samāpto jñānasya parmāṇavyāpāra iti |
T11dhnyabpu:1582: pramāṇādarśapariccittirūpasya phalasya bhinnatvaṃ darśayituṃ pramāṇajñānasya svarūpaṃ prāgdaśitamapi punarapi darśayati- prāpakaṃ jñānamityādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1588: yato bījādeḥ sakāśādakurasyārthāvabhāsitvotpattirasti, na ca bījādikaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1596: tasmāt pratyakṣasyārthaniścayasvabhavatvāt pratyakṣameva phalasvabhāvaṃ syāditi veditavyamityuktaṃ bhavati || 19 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1597: yadi pratyakṣameva phalasvabhāvam, tarhi pramāṇaṃ nāma kiṃ veditavyam?
T11dhnyabpu:1601: arthākāraṃ yat pratyakṣaṃ tadeva pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ || 20 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1606: yadi tarhi jñānaṃ pramitirūpatvāt pramāṇaphalam, ki tarhi pramāṇaphalam?
T11dhnyabpu:1608: arthena saha yat sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:1609: iha yasmād viṣayāt viṣayāt vijñānamudeti tadviṣayasadṛśaṃ tad bhavati yathā- nīlādutpadayamānaṃ nīlasadṛśam |
T11dhnyabpu:1612: nanu ca jñānādavyatiriktaṃ sādṛśyam, tathā ca sati tadeva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1615: yadyevam prāpaṇaśaktiḥ phalam, tarhi nārthapariccittirūpaṃ phalam, prāpakatvād, arthapariccitteranyatvādityāha-
T11dhnyabpu:1618: arthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastāt saṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvarūpacintāyām |
T11dhnyabpu:1619: tataśca arthapradaśekameva prāpakam, tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthapariccittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:1623: yadi jñānasya pramitirūpaṃ phalam, jñānāt tarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛccati- yadi tarhītyādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1628: viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati- iha yasmādityādinā || 20 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1631: tadeva kiṃ yasmādarthamārūpyavaśād niścayaḥ, tasmāt tat sārūpyameva
T11dhnyabpu:1633: evaṃ hi nīlasya pratītiriyam na pātasya iti vyavasthāpyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1634: tatra ca yo hetuḥ sa eva pramāṇatveneṣṭhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:1636: tathā hi taccendriyaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānasya sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamiti pratyekaniścayavyavasthitau kathaṃ samartha syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1638: pramāṇaphalam, na caikaṃ vastu sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ copapadyate, tat kathaṃ sārūpyaṃ pramāṇam? ityāha- tadvaśāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:1639: taditi sārūpyam, tasya vasāt sārūpya samarthyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1642: arthasya pratītirūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vijñānaṃ sārūpyavaśāt sidhyati, pratītaṃ bhavatī tyarthaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1643: nīlānirbhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ yataḥ tasmāt nīlasya pratītiravasīyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1645: vijñānamutpadyate, na tadvaśāt tajjñānaṃ naulasya saṃvedanaṃ śakyate
T11dhnyabpu:1648: na cātra janyajanakabhāvanibandhanah sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ, yenaikasmin vastuni virodhaḥ syāt
T11dhnyabpu:1650: tata ekasya vastunaḥ bauddhenāpi neṣyate, yenārthasārūpyaṃ pramāṇamitipyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1651: kiñci- arthasārūpye pramāṇe 'ṅgī kriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tat tadavasthameveti |
T11dhnyabpu:1653: evaṃ manyate- pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ ca sādhakatamaṃ kārakāṇām |
T11dhnyabpu:1660: yasmānnīlākāre vijñānasyāvagate nīlapratītiarvagamyate, tasmādarthākāraḥ pramāṇam karaṇadharmatvādasyeti
T11dhnyabpu:1661: nanu ca cakṣurādibhyo vijñānamutpadyate viśiṣṭārtha mavagaccatyeva tat kathamarthākārasya
T11dhnyabpu:1663: tat kathayati- cakṣurādīnāmapi vijñānotpattau nimittābhāvo 'sti, kintu teṣāṃ sarvajñānotpatti prati nimittatvānna pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanasya nimittatvam |
T11dhnyabpu:1664: arthākārasya tvasādhāraṇatvāt pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanaṃ prati nimittatvamiti tadeva pramāṇam
T11dhnyabpu:1665: yat tat pareṇa coditam- pramāṇaphalayoraikyātra caikaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhana vā syāditi?tat pariharati- na cātra janyajanaketyādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1666: dyādayamekasya virodho yadyayaṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ, ki
T11dhnyabpu:1670: atdindriyaṃ nīlajñānasyaiva janakaṃ syāt, pītādijñānaṃ ca na janayet tadaiva vyavasthāya samartha syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1672: kiñcid rūpaṃ pramānam, kiñcit pramaṇaphalaṃ na virudhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1675: vyavasthāpya- vyavasthāpakabhāvo 'pi kathamekasya jñānasya iti cet? ucyate nīlasadṛśamanubhūya tadvijñānaṃ yato nīlasya grāhakamavasthāpyate niścaya
T11dhnyabpu:1681: na tu nirvikalpakatvāt pratyaksameva nīlavodharūpatvenātmānamavasthapayituṃ śaknoti |
T11dhnyabpu:1683: tasmānniścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1686: tathā ca pramāṇaphalamarthā na tvartha utpādyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1687: tathāhi- nīlākāre vijñāna utpanna viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayati, nīlajñānamanubhūtamiti na jñānamutpādayati |
T11dhnyabpu:1689: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśāṃśitayā vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpakabhāvo bhavatīti manyamānaḥ pṛccati- vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpaketyādinā |
T11dhnyabpu:1691: evaṃ manyate- na vijñānameva nirvikalpakamātmānaṃ vyavasthāpayati, kintu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate |
T11dhnyabpu:1692: tatra cārthākārasya vyavasthāpanahetutvamasārūpyavyāvṛttibhedenārthabodhatayā vyavasthāpyasyotpādena vedanasya tu vyavasthāpyatvam niścayapratyayatu vyavasthāpaka iti |
T11dhnyabpu:1694: nanu nīlajñānamtpanna svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśāt pramāṇavyavasthā labhyate, tadā yupyate vaktum- niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate iti, yāvatā niścayapratyayaṃ vināpipramāṇaṃ bhavatyeva?
T11dhnyabpu:1695: ityāha- niścayapratyasenāvyavasthāpitamityādi sārūpyaṃ tu asādhāraṇatvāt pratyekaniścayavyavasthitiheturbhavati
T11dhnyabpu:1696: tathāhi nīlavijñānasya yo nīlākāraḥ sa pītādijñāne nāstīti vyavasthā syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:1697: yasmād nīlākāratvād ayaṃ nīlaḥ ityayeva pratītiḥ na tu pītaḥ iti buddhiḥ, tasmād arthasārūpameva pramāṇamiti || 21 ||
T11dhnyabpu:1701: hanitena tvadhyavasāyena sārūpyavaśānnīlabodharūpe jñāne vyavasthāpyamāne sārūpyavyavasthāpanahetutvāt pramāṇaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:1702: yadyavam, adhyavasāyasahitameva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt, na kevalam- iti
T11dhnyabpu:1708: parokṣamartha vikalpayanta utprekṣāmahe, na tu paśyāma iti utprekṣātmakaṃ vikalpavyāpāramanubhavādū adhyavasyanti |
T11dhnyabpu:1714: yāvat pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ nitpādayati, na tāvat pramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt

T11dhnyabpu:1728: lakṣaṇamabhidīyeta? vibhāgena ca pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sukhena vaktu
T11dhnyabpu:1735: yenātmanaḥ pratītistat svārtham, yena cāparasya pratipattistat

T11dhnyabpu:1739: athānumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kimakasmāt prakārabheda kathyate? ucyate parārthānumānaṃ śabdātmakam, svārthānumānaṃ tu jñānātmakam, tayoratyantabhedāt naikaṃ lakṣaṇamasti |
T11dhnyabpu:1741: prakārabhedo hi vyaktibhedaḥ, vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate

T11dhnyabpu:1751: tatra tayoḥ svārtha- parārthānumānayormadhye svārtha jñānaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:1753: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni tat trirūpam |
T11dhnyabpu:1757: 5 trairūpyaṃ punaliṃgasya anumeye sattvameva, sapakṣe eva sattvam,
T11dhnyabpu:1765: liṅgābhāsād yajjñānamutpadayate tadapyanumānaṃ syāditi tannirāsārthamanumeya ityuktam
T11dhnyabpu:1766: | jñānamiti kathanaṃ tu liṅgameva vastuto 'numānaṃ syāditi tannirāsārtham || 3 ||
