T11dhnyabpu:2751: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na sākṣādete prayogā dṛśyānupalabdhimabhidadhati,
T11dhnyabpu:2753: tataḥ praṇālikayāmīṣāṃ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṃgrahaḥ, na sākṣāditi || 43
T11dhnyabpu:2754: yadi prayogabhedādeṣa bhedaḥ, parāthānumāne vaktavya eṣaḥ, śabdabhedo hi prayogabhedaḥ, śabdaśca parārthānumānam? ityāśaṅkayāha-
T11dhnyabpu:2757: upalambhaḥ, tasya abhyāsaḥ= punaḥ punarāvartanam, tasmānnimittāt |
T11dhnyabpu:2767: tasmāt prayogeṣvabhyāsātiśayāt svayamapi yadā kasyacit vyavaccedapratītirbhavati, tadā prayogarūpeṇaiva pratītirbhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:2773: kāryānupalabdhyādau tadbhāvāt kathamavyabhicāritvamiti cet? tatrāha- abhāveti |
T11dhnyabpu:2774: abhāvavyavahārasādhanyo bahuprakārā yā anupalabdhayo 'bhihitāḥ, tāḥ sarvāstadviśetā eva draṣṭavyāḥ
T11dhnyabpu:2777: prayogābhyāsātḥ tasmāt svapratipattāvapyupayujyamānasyāsya prayogabhedasya svārthānumāne nirdeśaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:2778: yat punaḥ parapratipattāvevoyujyate, tat parārthānumāna eva vaktavyamiti || 44 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2780: dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt tathā ca sati na teṣāṃ
T11dhnyabpu:2789: yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2793: yasmāt svabhāvaviruddha ādiryaṣāṃ tesāmupalabdhyā, kāraṇamādiryeṣāṃ teṣāmanupalabdhyā pratiṣedha uktaḥ, tasmād dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedha
T11dhnyabpu:2795: yadi nāma svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha
T11dhnyabpu:2796: uktaḥ, tathāpi kathaṃ dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ? ityāha- upalabdhirityādi |
T11dhnyabpu:2798: yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpya- vyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca jñātāḥ, teṣāmavaśyamevopalabdhiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2803: svabhāvaviruddhādirapi yadi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva syāt, tadā viparītapratiṣedhe samarthaḥ, nānyathā |
T11dhnyabpu:2812: upalabdhyanupalabdhī ca dveyeṣāṃ staḥ, te dṛśyā eva
T11dhnyabpu:2813: | tasmāt svabhāpraviruddhādyu palabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānāmeva
T11dhnyabpu:2815: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaścakāro hetvartho bhavati
T11dhnyabpu:2816: | yasmādidaṃ cedaṃ ca samādhānamasti, tasmād tattaccodyamayuktamiti cakārārthaḥ || 45 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2819: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca kenacit saha abhāvaśca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve na sidhyati, yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddhe kāraṇād upalabdhyanupalabdhimanta eva viruddhādayo niṣedhyāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2822: tadayamarthaḥ- virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaśca dṛśyānupalabdhereveti
T11dhnyabpu:2825: | vyāpakābhimatābhāve ca vyāpyābhimatābhāve niścite niścito vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2827: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau pratīto vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2829: tasmādvirodham, kāryakāraṇabhāvam, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha kāryakāarṇabhāva
T11dhnyabpu:2834: tathāhi- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya niyatānuṣaṅgīṇo ye dṛṣṭāstatsannidhāne kasyacit tirobhāve tena saha virodhasya pratyāyanaṃ śakyam |
T11dhnyabpu:2837: evamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yasya sattve upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptamadṛṣṭapūrva yadupalabhyate, tadabhāve nopalabhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:2841: evamapi abhāvavyavahārasiddhirupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhisamāśritā ityuktaṃ bhavati nanu tadanyenāpi kvacit siddhiriti cet? ucyate- viprakṛṣṭetyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:2842: viprakṛṣṭī yo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttisvabhāvaḥ sa saṃśayasya hetuḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2847: tatra yadyapi sampratitanī nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ, virodhādigrahaṇakāle tvāsīt |
T11dhnyabpu:2849: tataḥ samprati nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2850: viruddhavidhinā kāraṇādiniṣedhena ca yato dṛśyānupalabdhirākṣiptā, tato dṛśyānupalabdhereva kālāntaravṛttāyāḥ smṛtiviṣayabhūtāyā abhāvapratipattiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2852: tadanena sarveṇa dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvo daśānāmamanupalabdhiprayogāṇāṃ pāramparyeṇa darśita ityavaseyam || 46 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2861: pramāṇanivṛttilakṣaṇā viprakṛṣṭaviṣayānupalabdhiḥ, pramānanivṛttirapi arthābhāvaṃ na sādhyati
T11dhnyabpu:2862: pramāṇaṃ tu arthakāryamiti pramāṇanivṛttyā kāraṇamātranivṛttinaṃ sidhyatīti || 48 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2864: nanu ca pramāṇāt prameyasattāvyavasthā, tataḥ pramāṇābhāvāt prameyābhāvapratipattiryuktā? ityāha- pramāṇanivṛttāvapītyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:2865: kāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca nivartamānaṃ kārya vyāpyaṃ ca nivartayet |
T11dhnyabpu:2866: na ca pramāṇaṃ prameyasya karaṇam, nāpi vyāpakam |
T11dhnyabpu:2870: yat punah pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati, tadyuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:2874: tasmāt pramāṇāt prameyasattā vyavasthāpyā, na pramāṇābhāvāt prameyābhāvavyavastheti || ācāryadharmottarakṛtāyāṃ vyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ svārthānumānaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:2883: trīṇi rūpāṇi santi yasya tat trirūpam |
T11dhnyabpu:2886: anumānaṃ ca samyagjñānamityuktam, kathamanumānaṃ vacanamiti cet? tatrāha-
T11dhnyabpu:2888: svārtha- parārthānumānayoḥ svārtha vyākhyāya, parārtha vyākhyātukāma āhatrirūpaliṅgākhyānamiti
T11dhnyabpu:2889: trīṇi rūpāṇi- anvaya vyatireka pakṣadharmatvasaṃjñakāni yasya tat trirūpam |
T11dhnyabpu:2895: nanu ca samyagjñānātmakamanumānamuktam, tat kimartha samprati
T11dhnyabpu:2899: tasmin kāraṇe vacane kāryasyānumānasya upacāraḥ samāropaḥ kriyate |
T11dhnyabpu:2902: na yāvat kiñcit upacārādanumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyaṃ tāvat sarva vyākhyeyam, kintvanumānaṃ vyākhyātukāmena anumānasvarūpasya
T11dhnyabpu:2905: tacca svayaṃ vā pratītamanumānasya nimittaṃ bhavati, pareṇa vā pratipāditaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:2907: tasmālliṅgasya svarūpaṃ ca vyākhyeyam, tatpratipādakaśca śabdaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2913: kāraṇaṃ hi vacanam, kārya cānumānamiti vacane tasminnanumānāropāt tadvacanamevānumānamityabhidhīyate
T11dhnyabpu:2921: kiṃ tat prakāraheyamiti āha? āha- sādharmyavaditi |
T11dhnyabpu:2922: samāno dharmo yasya sa sadharmā, sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyam,
T11dhnyabpu:2925: vidharmaṇo bhāvo vaidharmyam, tadayasyāsti tad vaidharmyavat |
T11dhnyabpu:2928: tataḥ pratipādakaṃ śabdamavaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ darśayan anumānaśabdenoktavānācārya iti paramārthaḥ parārthānumānasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayitukāma āha- tad dvividhamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:2930: dvau vidhau= prakārau yasya tad dvividham || 3 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2931: kuto dvividham? ityāha- prayogasya śabdavyāpārasya bhedāt |
T11dhnyabpu:2936: samāno dharmo 'sya so 'yaṃ sadharmā, tasya bhāvaḥ sādharmyam |
T11dhnyabpu:2937: visadṛśo dharmo 'sya vidharmā, vidharmāṇo bhāvo vaidharmyam |
T11dhnyabpu:2938: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇaḥ sādṛśyaṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādharmyamucyate
T11dhnyabpu:2940: tatra yasya sādhanavākyasya sādharmyamabhidheyaṃ tat sādharmyavat |
T11dhnyabpu:2942: yathā ghaṭaḥ, tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ ityatra kṛtakatvakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭānta sādhyadharmiṇoḥ sāduśyabhidheyam
T11dhnyabpu:2944: yathā- yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ākāśam,
T11dhnyabpu:2945: śabdastu kṛtakaḥ iti kṛtakatvākṛtakatvakṛtaṃ śabdākāśayoḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntadharmoṇorasādṛśyamihābhidheyam 6 nānayorarthataḥ kaścid bhedaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:2947: 8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'dvayava hāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ, yathānyo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścid śaśaviṣāṇādiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:2948: nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśaṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭaḥ-
T11dhnyabpu:2950: yadi sādharmyaprayogo 'nvayavān, vaidharmyaprayogaśca vyatirekavān, tarhi arthato 'pi bhedaḥ syāt, tat kasmāt prayogabhedena dvividhamityucyate iti cet? tatrāha nānayoriti |
T11dhnyabpu:2954: iha prayogasyaiva bhedaḥ, na tu sarvathāpi |
T11dhnyabpu:2955: tathā hi- prathame vastuto 'nvayābhidhāne 'pi vyatirekaḥ sāmarthyādavagamyate |
T11dhnyabpu:2956: dvitīye ca vastuto vyatirekā bhidhāne 'pi anvayo
T11dhnyabpu:2959: yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta sannopalabhyate so 'sadvayaydyanayoḥ prayogayorabhidheyaṃ bhinnam, kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamabhinnaṃ prakāśyam? ityāha- nānayorarthata iti |
T11dhnyabpu:2961: yat prayojanaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ vastu uddiśyānumāne prayujyate, tataḥ prayojanādanayorna bhedaḥ kaścit |
T11dhnyabpu:2966: tathā ca na tato bhedaḥ kaścit || 6 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2967: abhidheyabhedo 'pi tarhi na syāt? ityāha- anyatra prayogabhedāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:2972: anvaye hi kathite vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vyatirekagatirbhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:2975: na ca yatrābhidheyabhedaḥ, tatra sāmarthyagamyo 'pyartho bhidyate |
T11dhnyabpu:2976: yasmāt pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte pīno devadatto rātrau bhuṃkte ityanayovakyiyorabhidheyabhede 'pi gamyamānamekameva,
T11dhnyabpu:2978: 9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam, yathā ghaṭādiriti śuddhasya svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:2985: tena dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ nopalabhyate iti anena pakṣadharma uktaḥ || 8 ||
T11dhnyabpu:2987: dvitīyasya hetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga upadarśyate yat tatreti |
T11dhnyabpu:2999: yathoktam- vyāptirvyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāvaḥ iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3009: tata eva pramāṇādanena vākye nābhidhīyamānā vyāptirjñātavyā |
T11dhnyabpu:3010: samprati vyāpti kathayitvā dṛśyānupalambhasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitumāha nopalabhyate ceti
T11dhnyabpu:3017: sa evābhāvavyavahārādhikaraṇaṃ yaḥ pratipattaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, nānyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3020: yathā cāsato 'pi ghaṭasya samāropitamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ tathā vyākhyātam || 8 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3022: yathānupalabdheḥ, tathā svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3023: yat saditi sattvamanūdya tat sarvamanityamityanityanityatvaṃ vidhīyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3035: ātmabhūtadharmasyaiva bhedaṃ kṛtvā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3046: anityatvādanyatra nityatve sattvaṃ nāstītyevaṃ sattvamanityatve sādhye niyataṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati
T11dhnyabpu:3056: svabhāvaṃ bhūtaḥ tadātmako dhamaḥ, tasya bhedena |
T11dhnyabpu:3059: saiva vyāvṛttiryadā vyāvṛttyantaranirapekṣā vaktumiṣayte, tadā vyatirekiṇīva nirdeśyate- bhāvasya utpattiriti |
T11dhnyabpu:3060: tathā ca vyatiriktamevotpattyā viśiṣṭa vastu utpattimaduktam |
T11dhnyabpu:3061: tena svabhāvabhūtena dharmeṇa kalpitabhedena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukto viditavyaḥ || 10
T11dhnyabpu:3063: kṛtakatvamanūdyānityatvaṃ vidhīyate- iti anityatve niyataṃ kṛtakatvamuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:3067: tasya bhedena bhinnenopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukta ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3068: 12 apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3070: kathamanabhivyaktaviśeṣāṇaṃ iti cet? tatrāha- apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpatau kṛtaka iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3072: yaśca bhāvaḥ svabhāniṣpattaye hetūnāṃ vyāpāramapekṣate iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3076: tathā hi prayatne= hetuvyāpāre sati yasya siddhiḥ sa prayatnāntarīyaka iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3077: tena anityaṃ prayatnāntaroyakatvāda ityayanapi anabhivyaktaviśeṣaṇaḥ svabhāvahetureva |
T11dhnyabpu:3079: pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ śīla yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī, tasya bhāvaḥ pratyayabhedabheditvam
T11dhnyabpu:3081: tathā hi- svalpakardamapiṇḍād ghaṭaḥ kṣudro bhavati, mahatastu mahān bhavvati |
T11dhnyabpu:3082: nipuṇaiha kadāciccuddha evārtha ucyate, kadācidavyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ, kadācid vyatiriktena |
T11dhnyabpu:3087: nanu ca citraguśabde vyatiriktasya viśeṣaṇasya vācakaścitraśabdo
T11dhnyabpu:3088: gośabdaśvāsti, kṛtakaśabde tu nirviśeṣaṇavācinaḥ śabdasya prayogo 'sti?
T11dhnyabpu:3090: pareṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ svabhāvasya niṣpattau niṣpatyarthamapekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro yena sa tathoktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3092: yasmādapekṣitaparavyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate, tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāva ucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3093: yadyapi vyatiriktaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ na prayuktam, tathāpi kṛtaśabdenaiva vyatiriktaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3097: yatra ca viśeṣaṇamantarbhāvyate, tatra viśeṣaṇāpdaṃ na prayujyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3098: kvacittu prtīyamānaṃ viśeṣaṇam, yathā kṛta ityukte hetubirityetat pratīyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3099: tatra ca hetuśabdaḥ prayujyate, kadācinna vā prayujyate || 12
T11dhnyabpu:3101: yathā ca kṛtaśabdo bhinnaviśesaṇasvabhavābhidhāyo, evaṃ pratyayabhedabheditvamādiryeṣāṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3102: 14 sannutpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmopadarśanam ||
T11dhnyabpu:3103: 15 sarve ete sādhanadharmāḥ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddha sādhana dharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3106: tasmād anityaṃ pratyayabhedabheditvādityayamapi anabhivyaktaviśeṣaṇaḥ svabhāvahetureva || pūrva trayāṇāṃ svabhāvahetūnāmanvayamātramuktam, idānī tena kāraṇena
T11dhnyabpu:3108: san śabdaḥ, utpattimān śabdaḥ, kṛtakaḥ śabda iti
T11dhnyabpu:3110: tanmātrānubandhini sādhyadharme svabhāvo hetuḥ iti pūrva svabhāvahetulakṣaṇaṃ yadabhihitam, tatprayogārthamāha- sarve ete sādhanadharmā iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3111: pūrva yeṣāṃ trividhānāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ pakṣadharmā uktāḥ, te yathāsvaṃ pramāṇairiti |
T11dhnyabpu:3113: prayatnānantarīyakatvādīnāṃ te 'pi svabhāvahetoḥ prayogāḥ bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyino draṣṭavyāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3114: pratyayānām= kāraṇānām, bhedaḥ= viśeṣaḥ, tena pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3115: śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedo śabdaḥ, tasya bhāvaḥ pratyayabhedabheditvam |
T11dhnyabpu:3123: vācakabhedānmā bhūt kasyacit svabhāvahetāvapi prayukte vyāmoha iti || 13
T11dhnyabpu:3124: atha kimete svabhāvahetavaḥ siddhasambandhe svabhāve sādhye prayoktavyāḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3125: āhosvit asiddhasambandhe? it sardhayitumāha- sarve ete iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3127: sādhanāni, parāśritatvācca dharmāḥ, sādhanadharmā eva sādhanadharmamātram
T11dhnyabpu:3141: siddhaḥ sādhanadharmāmātrānubandho yasya sādhya dharmasya tasmin |
T11dhnyabpu:3142: yathāsvaṃ sādhyadharme sādhanadharmamātrānubandhe sādhite eva te pakṣadharmā hetutvenābhidheyā iti || 15 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3143: kasmācca sādhyadharme sādhanadahrmamātrānubandha iti cet? tatrāha-
T11dhnyabpu:3147: kṛtakaḥ, anyaśca anitya iti tu na |
T11dhnyabpu:3148: kathamiti cet? hetupratyayairyat kriyate tad vinaśyatsvabhāvameveti || 16 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3150: yasya sādhyadharmasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena siddha ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3151: svabhāvahetūnāṃ ca bahubhedadatvāt sambandhasādhanānyapi pramāṇāni bahūnīti pramāṇairiti bahuvacana
T11dhnyabpu:3153: tadayaṃ paramārthaḥ- na hetuḥ pradīpavat yogyatayā gamakaḥ, apitu nāntarīyakatayā viniścitaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3156: prathamaṃ bādhakena pramāṇena sādhyapratibandho niścetavyo hetoḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3158: kṛtakatvaṃ nāmānityasvabhāvamiti sāmānyena smṛtamarya punarviśeṣe yojayati- idamapi kṛtakatvaṃ śabde vartamānamanityasvabhāvameveti |
T11dhnyabpu:3162: tena niścitatanmātrānubandhe sādhyadharme svabhāva hetavaḥ prayoktavyāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3164: yadyevaṃ sambandho niścetavyaḥ sāśyasya sādhanena saha,
T11dhnyabpu:3170: yo hi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhavān sa eva tasya sādhanadharmasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3176: atra sādhyasya svabhava eva heturuktaḥ, kathaṃ sādhyānanubandhī syāt tathā hi tanmātrānubandho svabhāva eveti || 17 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3177: tacca kasmāt iti cet? tatrāha- tanniṣpattāviti |
T11dhnyabpu:3179: siddhayati, tadā kṛtakatvānityatve paramārthata ekasvabhāve na syātām ||
T11dhnyabpu:3180: bhavatu īdṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ, svabhāva eva tu sādhye kasmād hetuprayogaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3183: tasmāt sa eva sādhyaḥ kartavyoḥ yaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3185: yadi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanasya svabhavaḥ syāt, pratijñārthaikadeśastarhi hetuḥ syāt? ityāha- vastuta iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3189: niścayārūḍhaṃ ca rūpaṃ samāropitena bhedenetaretaravyāvṛttikena bhinnamiti anyat sādhanam, anyat sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3190: dūrāddhi śākhādimānartho vṛkṣaḥ iti niścīyate na śiśapeti |
T11dhnyabpu:3191: atha ca sa eva vṛkṣaḥ, saiva śiśapā |
T11dhnyabpu:3197: kasmāt punaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhyeva sādhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nānyaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3203: yadi ca pūrva niṣpannasya, aniṣpannasya caikyaṃ bhavedū,
T11dhnyabpu:3205: na ca viruddhayorbhāvābhāvayoraikyaṃ yujyateḥ, viruddhadharmasaṃsargātmaka katvādekatvābhavasya
T11dhnyabpu:3209: 21 kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ, yathā mahānasādau |
T11dhnyabpu:3211: 22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3214: tadavaśyamevānutpannasya kasyāpi vināśasyāpi na sambhava iti || 20 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3218: yatreti asmin pardeśe dhūmastatra sarvatrāgnirityanvaya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3222: abhimatadeśe ca dhūmo dṛśyata iti pakṣadharmo darśitaḥ || 21 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3223: kāryahetāvapi pūrva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sādhanīyaḥ anantaraṃ ca kāraṇasādhanārtha kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3224: tathā hi- svarūpeṇa niścitameva liṅga jñeyam, na tu aniścitameveti || 22 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3228: mā bhūt paścānniṣpannaḥ pūrvajasya svabhāvaḥ, sādhyastu kasmānna bhavati?
T11dhnyabpu:3230: parityāgo yastasya sambhavācca na pūrvaniṣpannasya paścānniṣpannaḥ sādhyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3233: tathā ca siddhasādhanadharma mātranubandha eva svabhāve svabhavahetavaḥ prayoktavyā iti sthitam kāryahetoḥ prayoga iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3235: yatra dhūma iti dhūmamanūdya tatrāgniriti agnevidhiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3245: kāryakāraṇabhāvanścayo hyavaśyaṃ kartavyaḥ, yato na yogyatayā heturgamako 'pitu nāntarīkatvādityuktam 23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sad upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3248: na caiva mihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhiḥ rghaṭasyeti anupalabdhiprayogaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3249: 24 asati anityatve, nāsti sattvam utpattimattvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ vā |
T11dhnyabpu:3250: san ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako veti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3254: sacca vastu kimapyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yadi syāt, tadā avaśyamupalabhyeta |
T11dhnyabpu:3266: san ca śabda utpattimān, kṛtako veti pakṣadharmā uktāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3274: tadanena dṛśyasya sattvaṃ darśanaviṣayatvena vyāptaṃ kathitam,
T11dhnyabpu:3278: tathā ca sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛtti niyatatvāt sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā |
T11dhnyabpu:3279: yadi ca dharmiṇi sādhayadharmo na bhaved, heturapi na bhavet |
T11dhnyabpu:3282: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād vyāpyasya sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatirbhavati tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhnābhāve sādhyābhāvo niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ || 23 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3287: atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3295: sādharmyavadanumāne cānvayaḥ, pakṣadharmī vyatirekaśceti trīṇi rūpāṇi
T11dhnyabpu:3296: nābhivyaktāni, kathaṃ parārthānumānaṃ tirūpaliṅgākhyānamiti cet? tatrāha-
T11dhnyabpu:3300: sāmarthya ca kīdṛśamīt cet? āha- asatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3301: yadi vyatireko na syāt, tadā sādhyena hetoranvayo 'pyasidha eva syāditi ||
T11dhnyabpu:3313: nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatirekonoktaḥ, vaidharmyavati cānvayaḥ, tat kathametat trirūpāliṅgākhyānām? ityāha- sādharmyaiṇeti |
T11dhnyabpu:3314: sādharmyaiṇāpyabhidheyena yukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt sāmarthyāt vaidharmyasya vyatirekasya gatirbhavatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3317: yadi nāma vyatireko 'nvayavatā noktaḥ, tathāpi anvayavācakaḥ sāmarthyā
T11dhnyabpu:3319: katham? asati tasmin vyatireke buddhayā vyavasite sādhyena hetoranvayasya buddhayāśyavasitasyābhāvāt
T11dhnyabpu:3320: sādhye niyataṃ sādhanamanvayavākyādavasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3330: atha tacca sādharmya kīdṛśamiti cet? āha- asatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3331: yadi sādhyena hetoranvayo na syāt tadā sādhyābhāve 'pi hetorabhāvaḥ katham syāt || 29 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3332: anvayābhāve vyatireko 'siddha ityetat kasmāditi cet? tatrāha- nahītyādi |
T11dhnyabpu:3333: yadi svabhāvapratibandha ātmā svarūpeṇa pratibandho na syāt tadā ekanivṛttāvapi aparasya nivṛttirniyamena na syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3337: pratibandho yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāradvaya evāntarbhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3340: yathā anvayavākye, tathā arthādeva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge
T11dhnyabpu:3342: katham? asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddhe
T11dhnyabpu:3344: hetvabhāve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyādavasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ, itarathā hetvabhāve niyato na syāt pratītaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3348: yadi nāmākāśādau sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvaḥ,tathāpi kimīt hetusambhave sādhyasambhavaḥ? ityāha- nahīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3349: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ || 30 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3350: sa ca svabhāvapratibandho dviprakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya |
T11dhnyabpu:3351: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3357: 32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3359: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ miti tasya ātmā tadātmā, tadātmano bhāvastādātmyam, tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3361: tasmādutpattistadutpattiḥ, tadutpattirlakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa tadutpattilakṣaṇa iti vigrahaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3363: yasmāt pratibandhe sati ekanivṛttyā aparanivṛttirbhavati, abhāve na tena
T11dhnyabpu:3367: yadayavam syādeva, tataśca kimāyātam? iti cedāha- yadeva pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvaya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3368: tasmādekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛta bhavatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3370: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe nivartyanivartakabhāvaḥ, tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3371: yadi hi sādhanaṃ sādhye pratibaddham bhavet, evaṃ sādhyanivṛtau tanniyamena nivarteta |
T11dhnyabpu:3373: darśanīyaḥ, tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3377: yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ, nāparaḥ kaścit, tasmāt nivartya nivartakayoḥ pratibandho jñātavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3378: tathā ca anvaya eva jñāto bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3380: yasmādanvaye 'pi vyatirekagatiḥ vyatireke cānvayagatiḥ, tasmādekenāpi sapakṣe cāsapakṣe ca sattvāsattvayoḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:3381: anvayo mukham= upāyo 'bhidheyatvād yasya tad anvayamukhaṃ vākyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3385: tasmād ekasmin sādhanavākye dvayoranvaya vyatirekayoravaśyameva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3386: 33 anupalabdhāvapi yatsad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata evetyukte 'nupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśamasaditi pratīteranvayadisśiḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3388: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatirekamukhena karaṇamapi yuktameva, tathāpi uktaprakāreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sattvāsattvayorabhidhānameva sattvāsattvapradarśanaṃ bhavatīti ubhayenāpi liṅgena pratyekaṃ kriyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3390: tasmādekasminneva prayoge sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca vākyadvayasya prayogo nāvaśyaṃ kāryaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3394: yadopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yadi syād, avaśyamupalabhyeta iti vyatireka ucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:3399: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati cānumāne ubhayatrāi pakṣanirdeśo nāsti |
T11dhnyabpu:3400: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet? tatrāha- dvayorapīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3401: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti || 34 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3411: yadi ca sādhanasambhave 'pi sādhyanivṛttirbhavet na sādhanābhāvena vyāptā bhavet |
T11dhnyabpu:3412: ato vyāptiṃ pratipadyamānena sādhanasambhavaḥ sādhyasambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3417: yataśca sādhanaṃ sādhyadharmapratibaddhaṃ tādātmya tadutpattibhyāṃ pratipattavyaṃ dvayorapi prayogayoḥ, tasmāt pakṣo 'vaśyameva na nirdheśyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3418: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3421: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva |
T11dhnyabpu:3422: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati
T11dhnyabpu:3423: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3424: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3426: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3428: yadā sāmarthyena pratijñārthapratītirjāyate tadā pratijñāvacanaśravaṇe uparodhenāpi ka āgrahī syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3429: evaṃ ca yadā sāmarthyena vitarkaviṣayārthaviniścayaḥ, pakṣadharmavyāptinirdeśabalācca pratijñārthāvagamastatra pakṣanirdeśena kim? etacca viniścayavacanābhidhāne draṣṭavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3431: sādharmyavati prayoge 'pi sāmarthyādeva neha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3432: ki punastatsāmarthyam? ityāha- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti anupalambhānuvādaḥ so 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3435: nopalabhyate ca ityādinā sādhyadharmiṇi sattvaṃ liṅgasya darśitam |
T11dhnyabpu:3436: yadi ca sādhyadharmastatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet, sādhanadharmo 'pi na bhavet |
T11dhnyabpu:3438: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi neha sadvayavahāraviṣayo 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3445: anena ca sādhyanivṛtiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā |
T11dhnyabpu:3447: yathānyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3451: yadi ca sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhana
T11dhnyabpu:3456: bhidhānārthe pakṣanirdeśe ca doṣaḥ ko 'pi nāsti |
T11dhnyabpu:3458: | yadi punaḥ sarvathā pakṣanirdeśapratiṣedha evābhirpetaḥ syāt, tarhi vacanametadavaśyaṃ nopadiśyeta ityuktaṃ bhavatīti || 36 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3459: yadi viniścayavacanābhidhāne ca pakṣanirdeśa iti ucyate, yatra prapañcābhidhānaṃ tatra nirdeśaḥ, tarhi kīdṛglakṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣatvenābhidheya iti ced? āha- kīdṛśa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3460: yaścārtho vādayabhimatena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sādhyarūpeṇaiva nirdiśyate, tathā pratyakṣādinā ca na nirākriyate tādṛśo 'rthaḥ pakṣa iti abhidheyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3463: sādhyarūpeṇa vinā anyarūpeṇa na yujyate iti svarūpeṇoktameva sādhyatvenāvagantavyamiti || anayoktyā kevalasādhyarūpeṇa nirdeśyasyaiva pakṣatvenābhidhānam |
T11dhnyabpu:3467: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāstyatra ghaṭa iti pratītena pakṣanirdeśaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3468: evaṃ kārya svabhāvahetvorapi samarthyāt sampratyaya iti na pakṣanirdeśaḥ || 36 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3477: evambhūtaḥ san pratyakṣādibhiḥ anirākṛto yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣa ityucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3478: atha yadi pakṣo na nirdeśyaḥ, kathamanirdeśyasya lakṣaṇamuktam? na sādhanavākyāvayavatvādasya lakṣaṇamuktam, api tvasādhye kecit sādhyam,
T11dhnyabpu:3488: 41 yathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ, śabde 'siddhatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:3494: yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'nityaḥ ityucyamāne tacca cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde 'siddhamiti
T11dhnyabpu:3497: yadi tasmin sādhyarūpamastyeva, kasmānna pakṣa iti ced? āha- atreti |
T11dhnyabpu:3503: sādhanaṃ kathayatā svayaṃ nirdeśyo yo 'rthaḥ sa eva pakṣaḥ, śāstrakāreṇa nirdeśyastu neti śeṣaḥ || 42 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3504: pratyavamraṣṭavyaḥ, tat kimartha svarūpaśabdena saha pratyavamuṣṭaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3506: padāntarābhihitasyarthasya viśeṣa dayotayati- iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3512: śabdayānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyam ityanena sādhyatveneṣṭimāha
T11dhnyabpu:3520: svayamityanena svayaṃ śabdaṃ vyākhyeyamupakṣipya tasyārthamāha- svayamiti
T11dhnyabpu:3521: | svayaṃśabdo nipātaḥ ātmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantasya ātmanā iti ca tṛtīyāntasyārthe vartate
T11dhnyabpu:3525: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārtha yuktaḥ, sa eva tṛtīyārthayukto nirdiṣṭo vādineti |
T11dhnyabpu:3526: na tu svayaṃśabdasya vādinā ityeṣa paryāyaḥ || 42 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3530: 44 etena yadayapi kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanamaha, taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pīti yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati 45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimiccatā so 'nukto pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati ||
T11dhnyabpu:3531: teneti vādinā nirdeśya eva pakṣa ucyate || 43 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3532: kaścit kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ pakṣe kṛtaniścaya eva |
T11dhnyabpu:3534: tathāpi yadi śāstrāduddhṛtya pramāṇikriyate iti śeṣaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3535: vādī yasmin śāstre sādhanaṃ kathayati taccāstrakāreṇa vitarkaviṣayadharmiṇi yadi bahavo dharmā aṅgīkriyante, tathāpi ca |
T11dhnyabpu:3536: vādinaiva yo dharma sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3537: śāstrakāreroṣṭastu na yasmād vādinā nirdeśyasya pakṣatvamaṅgīkriyate tasmād vādinā śāstrāṅgīkāradvāreṇopakārako yo dharmaḥ pariṣkartumiṣyate sa eva sādhyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3541: vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ ityuktam, etena ca kimuktena? anena tadā vādakāle
T11dhnyabpu:3542: tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ, sa eva sādhyaḥ, netaro
T11dhnyabpu:3546: atha kasmin sati anyadharmasādhyatvasya sambhavaḥ, yannivṛttayartha tad vaktavyam? ityāha- taccāstrakāreṇeti |
T11dhnyabpu:3547: yaccāstraṃ tena vādinābhyupagataṃ taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharmasādhyatvasambhavaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3549: dharmaḥ sarva eva tena sādhya ityasti vipratipattiḥ, anenāpāsyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3550: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhyo yo vādinā iṣṭaḥ, nānya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3551: nanu ca śāstrānapekṣaṃ vastuvalapravṛtaṃ liṅgam, ato 'napekṣaṇīyatvānna
T11dhnyabpu:3552: śāstra sthitvā vādaḥ kartavyaḥ? satyamḥ āhopuruṣikayā tu yadayapi kvaciccāstre sthita iti kiñciccāstramabhyupagataḥ sādhanamāha, tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ iti jñāpanāyedamuktam iṣṭaśabdamukṣipya vyācaṣṭe- iṣṭa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3556: atra ātmārthā ityanukte 'pi ātmārthataiva sādhyaṃ bhavatīti |
T11dhnyabpu:3559: yasmin vastuni vivāda utpannaḥ, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vastu sādhayitumiccatā sādhyatvenopanyasto 'rtha eveṣṭa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3560: yadi vitarkaviṣayārtho 'so vacanena nābhidhīyate, tathāpi sa eva sādhyo bhavati || 45 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3561: tacca kasmād iti ced? āha- tadadhikaraṇatvāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:3562: tata eva yasmād vivādaḥ kathamasau vivāda eva sādhyo na syāt || 46 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3563: yacca vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vacanenānuktamapi sādhyameveṣyata iti katham iti ced? tathāha- yatheti |
T11dhnyabpu:3567: sādhanamupanyastan, tasyātmārthasya siddhi niścayam iccatā vādinā so
T11dhnyabpu:3569: yat tad ityukta bhavati iti grahaṇamante tadihāpekṣya vākyaṃ samāpayitavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3570: yadyapi parārthānumāne ukta eva sādhyo yuktaḥ, anukto 'pi tu vacanena sādhyaḥ, sāmarthyoktatvāt tasya || 45 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3574: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākartumiccatā vādinā
T11dhnyabpu:3575: sādhanamupanyastam, tasmād yad adhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tadeva sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3576: yato viruddhaṃ vādamapanetuṃ sādhanamukpanyastaṃ taccet na sādhyam, kimidānīṃ jātiniyataṃ kiñcit sādhyaṃ syāditi || 46 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3577: anuktamapi parārthānumāne sādhyamiṣṭam, tadudāharati- parārthā iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3578: cakṣurādiryeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te cakṣurādaya iti dharmī |
T11dhnyabpu:3582: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādau yasya taccayanāsanādi puruṣopabhogāṅgaṃ saṅghātarūpam |
T11dhnyabpu:3587: 49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti ||
T11dhnyabpu:3588: yathā śayanāsanādīnyaṅgāni saṅghātarūpatvāt parārthāni dṛṣṭāni, tathā cakṣurādayo 'pi saṅghātarūpatvāt parārthā eveti prayogārthaḥ || 47 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3589: asmin prayoge yadayapi cakṣurādaya ātmārthā iti noktam, tathāpi ātmārthataiva sādhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3593: yasmādevamanuyuktamapīṣṭatvena viṣayīkaraṇāt sādhyatvenaivaṣṭam, tasmāt kevalamuktameva na sādhyaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3595: tathā hi sāṅkhayanoktam- asti ātmā, tadviruddhaṃ bauddhenoktam- nāstyātmā
T11dhnyabpu:3596: iti, tataḥ sāṅkhayena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavādaṃ hetūkṛtya viruddhavādanirākaraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanamupanyastam |
T11dhnyabpu:3598: śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣu ātmārthatvenāvvayo na prasiddhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3604: parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyāt ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyati
T11dhnyabpu:3606: tena iṣṭasādhyatvavacanena noktamātram, api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭam uktamanuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam- ityuktaṃ bhavati || 47 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3610: anantaraprakrāntaṃ yat pakṣalakṣaṇamuktam- sādhyatveneṣṭaḥ ityādi, etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pyartho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham pratipādanāya anirākṛtagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:3611: kīdṛśo 'rtho na pakṣaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'pi? ityāha- yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca anumānaṃ ca pratīniśca svavacanaṃ ca-
T11dhnyabpu:3612: etairnirākriyate viparītaḥ sādhyate, na sa pakṣa iti || 48 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3619: yathoktalakṣaṇayukto 'pyartho yadi sādhanadaśāyāṃ pratyakṣānumānaprasiddhisvavacanairnirākriyate, tadā so 'rthaḥ pakṣo na bhavatīti pradarśanārthamanirākṛta ityuktam || 48 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3628: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti partijñā tu pratyakṣeṇa nirākriyate| tathā hi-
T11dhnyabpu:3630: tena śabde śrāvaṇatvasya svakīyajñānena pratīteraśrāvaṇatvaṃ nirākriyate
T11dhnyabpu:3631: atra- ghaṭasya nityatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ kṛtādyanumānena nirākriyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3632: tathā hi kṛtakamanityaṃ dṛṣṭam, ghaṭo 'pi kṛtaka iti, tena kuto nityatvam || 50
T11dhnyabpu:3633: yadi kenacit śaśī na candraśabdabhidheyaḥ iti pratijñā kriyate, sa tu śaśī
T11dhnyabpu:3635: api ca sarveṣvartheṣu sarvasya śabdasya vācyatayāpi nirākriyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3643: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3652: yaccabdākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3656: yasmād vikalpaviṣayatvamātrānubandhanī sāṅketikaśabdavācyatā, tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam avācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṣṭavyam
T11dhnyabpu:3658: kenacid anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati ityucyamāne tat svavacanena viruddham
T11dhnyabpu:3659: | anumānaṃ pramāṇameva yadi na syāt, etat vacanamapi na vaktavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3661: anumānaṃ ca yadi pramāṇaṃ na syāt vākyaṃ tāvat kutaḥ pramāṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:3662: tad vākyamapramāṇaṃ cet, kasmāducyate iti svavacanena viruddham || 52 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3663: svavacanaṃ pratijñārthasyātmauyo vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, tena nirākṛtaḥ pratijñārtho na sādhyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3666: sa nānumānaṃ pramāṇam ityanena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3667: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvamiṣṭaṃ sūcayati |
T11dhnyabpu:3668: tathā hi- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayastavotpadyate so 'satyārthaḥ iti darśayan vākyameva
T11dhnyabpu:3671: yo 'pi hi sarva mithyā bravīmi iti vakti, so 'pyasya
T11dhnyabpu:3676: etadeva tu yadyasatyārtham, anyānyasatyārthāni na darśatāni
T11dhnyabpu:3679: tasmād vākyaprabhavavākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayannev vaktā vākyamuccārayati
T11dhnyabpu:3680: tathā ca sati vāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayitavyam
T11dhnyabpu:3681: tato bāhyārthakāryāccabdādutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthamādarśayatā kāryaliṅgajamanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3682: tasmāt nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsatrārtho grāhya uktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3687: tadevaṃ svavacnānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitamuktamityayamatrārthaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3691: tadayuktamḥ yata iha pratīteḥ svabhāvahetutvam, svavacanasya ca kārya
T11dhnyabpu:3693: 54 evaṃ siddhasya, asiddhasyāpi sādhanatvenābhimatasya, tadā svayaṃ vādinā
T11dhnyabpu:3694: sādhayitumaniṣṭasya, uktamātrasya, nirākṛtasya ca viparyayeṇa sādhya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:3695: tenaiva svarūpeṇa vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamana
T11dhnyabpu:3704: etena siddhasya viparītam asiddhasyāpi viparītam, sādhanatvenābhimatasya viparītam, tadā vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitumaniṣṭasya viparītam, uktamātrasya viparītam,
T11dhnyabpu:3705: nirākṛtamātrasya ca viparītaṃ pakṣatvena draṣṭavyamityayamartha ukto bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3708: abhiprākāryatvaṃ ca vāstavameva śabdasya tatastadiha na gṛhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3709: kiñci- yathā anumānamican, vahnayavyabhicāritvaṃ dhūmasya pratyeti, tathā śabdasyāpyabhiprāyāvyabhicāritvaṃ na pratyeṣyati |
T11dhnyabpu:3712: api ca, na svābhiprāyanivedanāya śabda uccāryate, api tu bāhyasattvapratipādanāya |
T11dhnyabpu:3715: evaṃ ca sati anirākṛtagrahaṇena anantaroktāścatvāraḥ pakṣavadavabhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti || 53 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3716: samprati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavaccedakāni teṣāṃ vyavaccedena yādṛśaḥ pakṣārtho labhyate, taṃ darśayituṃ vyavaccedayāna saṃkṣipya
T11dhnyabpu:3719: siddhasya viparyayeṇa viparītvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3720: yasmādarthāt siddho 'rtho viparītaḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3723: asiddho 'pi na sarvaḥ, api tu sādhanatvenoktasyāsiddhasyāpi
T11dhnyabpu:3745: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ yogyamekamapi yadayuktamai vādiprativādinorasiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā syat, tadāpi sādhanābhāsaḥ, syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3747: yaścāyaṃ pañcabhirvyavccedayai rahito 'rthosiddho 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇairanirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ, sa evāso svarūpeṇaiva svayamiṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padairukta ityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3748: yaścāyaṃ sādhayḥ sa pakṣa iti ucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3756: etaduktaṃ bhavati- trirūpaliṅgaṃ vaktukāmena sphuṭaṃ tad vaktavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3757: evaṃ ca tat sphuṭamuktaṃ bhavati yadi tacca, tatpratirūpakaṃ cocyate |
T11dhnyabpu:3765: sādhanasya ābhāsaḥ sadṛśaṃ sādhanasya, na sādhanamityarthaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3769: pratipāvayasya prativādinaḥ pratipādakasya ca vādino hetvābhāsaḥ || 56 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3770: 57 ekasya svarūpasya dharmisambandhasyāsiddhau sandehe vāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3771: 58 yathā- anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvamubhayāsiddham ||
T11dhnyabpu:3772: 59 cetanāstaravaḥ iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādayasiddham
T11dhnyabpu:3778: tasyāsiddhau sandehe cāsiddho nāma hetvābhāso bhavati || 57 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3781: yadi digambarairuktam-vṛkṣāḥ cetanāḥ sarvatvagapaharaṇai maraṇāt iti bauddhaiḥ prayogate, tarhi vṛkṣāṇāṃ sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ bauddhānāmasiddham |
T11dhnyabpu:3783: atha kasyaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau sandehe vā kisaṃjñako hetvabhāsaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3786: dharmiṇi sattvaṃ hetoḥ tasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhasaṃjñako hetvābhāsaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3789: na viruddhasya, na saṃśayasya hetuḥ, api tvapratipattihetuḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3794: anityaḥ śabda ityanityatvaviśiṣṭe śabde sāvye cākṣuṣatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ śabde dvayorapi vādiprativādinora siddham ||
T11dhnyabpu:3797: sarvā tvak sarvatvak tasyā apaharaṇe sati maraṇaṃ digambarairūpanyastaṃ prativādino bauddhasya asiddham |
T11dhnyabpu:3799: vijñānaṃ cendriyaṃ cāyuśceti dvandvaḥ tatra vijñānaṃ cakṣurādijanitam |
T11dhnyabpu:3800: rūpādivijñānotpattyā yadanumitaṃ kāryāntarbhūtaṃ cakṣurgolakādisthitaṃ rūpaṃ tad indriyam
T11dhnyabpu:3805: sa lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ yasya tat tathoktamḥ tathābhūtasya maraṇasyānena bauddhena pratijñātatvāt
T11dhnyabpu:3806: 60 acetanāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddham
T11dhnyabpu:3807: vijñānaṃ ca indriyāṇi ca āyuśceti vigrahaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3809: sa eva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya maraṇasya tad vijñānendriyāyunirodhalakṣaṇaṃ maraṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:3812: tādṛśaṃ hi maraṇaṃ vṛkṣeṣu na sambhavatīti || 59 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3813: yadā sāṅkhyairuktam- sukhādayo 'cetanāḥ, utpattimattvādanityatvāt iti bauddhaiḥ pramīyate, tadā sukhādiṣūtpattiranityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayānāṃ svayamevāsiddhamḥ tasya hi kimapi notpadyate, kimapi vā na vinaśyati || 60
T11dhnyabpu:3814: yadi nāmaivam, tathāpi kathamasiddham? ityāha- tasya ca vijñānādinirodhātmakasya taruṣvasambhavāt
T11dhnyabpu:3816: tataśca yo vijñānanirodhaṃ taruṣviccet, sa kathaṃ vijñānaṃ neccet |
T11dhnyabpu:3818: nanu ca śoṣo 'pi maraṇamucyate, sa ca taruṣu siddhaḥ? satyamḥ kevalaṃ vijñānasattayā vyāptaṃ yat maraṇaṃ tadiha hetuḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3822: digambarastu sādhyena vyāptavyāptaṃ vā maraṇamavivicya maraṇamātraṃ hetumāha |
T11dhnyabpu:3823: tadasya vādino hetubhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ na jñātam |
T11dhnyabpu:3824: ajñānāt siddhaṃ śoṣarūpam, śoṣarūpasya maraṇasya taruṣu darśanāt prativādinastu jñātam,
T11dhnyabpu:3826: yadā tu vādino 'pi jñātam, tadā vādino 'pyasiddhaṃ syāditi nyāyaḥ || 59 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3829: teṣāmacaitanye sādhye utpattimattvam, anityatvaṃ vā liṅgamupanyastam |
T11dhnyabpu:3830: ya utpattimanto 'nityā vā te na cetanāḥ, yathā rūpādayaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3831: tathā ca- utpatti manto 'nityā vā sukhādayaḥ tasmādacetanāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3833: atra cotpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetuḥ na yugapat |
T11dhnyabpu:3834: tacca dvayamapi sāṃkhyasya vādino na siddham |
T11dhnyabpu:3836: tena yaḥ parasya siddhaḥ sa heturvaktavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3845: yadā hetorātmanastadadhikaraṇasya vās andehaḥ, tadā asiddhaetvābhāso bhavati || 61 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3847: vāṣpa ādiryasya sa vāṣpādiḥ, teṣāṃ bhāvo vāṣpādibhāvaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3850: agnisiddhau hetuḥ kriyate ced? asau vāṣpo vā dhūlirvā kuhelikā vā? iti vāṣpādibhāvena sandihyamānaḥ asiddhahetvābhāso bhavati || 62 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3854: yadi kenacit iha nikuñje mayuro 'sti, kekāyitādu iti pramīyate, tadā mayūradhvanistatra tadabhimatānikuñje sandigdha eva || 63 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3856: yadi tvanityatvotpattimattvayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ vādinā jñātaṃ syāt, tadā vādino 'pi siddhaṃ syāt
T11dhnyabpu:3865: tatra hi heturvartamāno gamakatvenāśrīyate tasyaśrayaṇasya sandehe sandigdhaḥ || 61 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3871: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā dhūmo 'pi vāṣpāditvena sandigdho bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:3874: | yadātu sandigdhaḥ, tadā na gamakaḥ- ityasiddhatākhyo doṣaḥ || 62 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3877: parvato paribhāgena tiryaṅnirgatena praccādito bhūbhāgo nikuñjaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:3882: 65 dhamyaṃsiddhāvapyasiddhaḥ- yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sadhye sarvatro
T11dhnyabpu:3884: kathaṃ sandigdha iti cet? āha- tadeti |
T11dhnyabpu:3886: sa hi mayūradhvaniḥ kasmānnikuñjapradeśānniḥ saratītyatra saṃśaya eva |
T11dhnyabpu:3893: tathāhi- sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ yasya dharma uktaḥ sa ātmaiva nāsti |
T11dhnyabpu:3896: te ca sarvadeśasya eva devadatta upalabhyante |
T11dhnyabpu:3898: yasmāttasya guṇāḥ sarvatropalabhyante, tasmāt nūnamātmā sarvatra
T11dhnyabpu:3902: āgamanam, tasya deśaḥ sa ucyate yasmād deśādāgaccati kekāyitam |
T11dhnyabpu:3904: nirantareṣu bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu satsu yadā kekāyitāpātanikuñje vibhramaḥ- kimasmānnikuñjāt
T11dhnyabpu:3910: sarvatra deśe upalabhyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkheccārāgadveṣādayo guṇā yasyātmanastasya bhāvastattvam
T11dhnyabpu:3911: na guṇā guṇinamantareṇa vartante, guṇānāṃ guṇini samavāyāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3913: tataśca yadi vyāpī na bhavet, kathaṃ darkṣiṇāpathe upalabdhaḥ dukhādayo madhyadeśe upalabhyeran tasmāt sarvagata ātmā |
T11dhnyabpu:3914: tadiha bauddhasya ātmaiva na siddhaḥ, kimuta sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ sidhyet tasya ityasiddhau hetvābhāsaḥ pūrvamāśrayaṇasandehena dharmiṇi
T11dhnyabpu:3919: 67 yathā śabdasyānityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3925: śabdo 'nityaḥ prameyatvāt iti sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatrāsti |

T11dhnyabpu:3930: eko 'nta ekāntaḥ= niścayaḥ, sa prayojanamasyeti aikāntikaḥ, naikāntiko

T11dhnyabpu:3942: tathā hi- anityaḥ śabdaḥ, prameyatvāt, ghaṭavat ākāśavat- iti prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyapi
T11dhnyabpu:3944: ityanityatvaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti vidyudādāvasti, nākāśādauḥ vipakṣavyāpi prayatnānatarīyake sarvatra bhāvāt |
T11dhnyabpu:3945: anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭavat, vidyudākāśavacca ityanityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛtti
T11dhnyabpu:3949: ityamūrtatvamubhayaikadeśavṛtti, ubhayorekadeśe ākāśe karmaṇi ca vartateḥ paramāṇau tu
T11dhnyabpu:3951: 69 yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavāvṛttikaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:3952: sādhye, anityatvaṃ upakṣasya sarvatra vipakṣasya caikadeśe 'sti |

T11dhnyabpu:3959: sa cānaikāntikaḥ kinnāmaka iti cet? āha- sandigdhetyādi |

T11dhnyabpu:3962: sarvajñaḥ kaścid vaktā na dṛśyate iti adarśane 'pi vyatireka siddhirna bhavati || 69 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3963: sapakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau ca vipakṣaikadeśe na vartateḥ, mūrtatvād ghaṭaparamāṇuprabhatīnām
T11dhnyabpu:3969: yathā cāsya rūpasyāsiddhavanaikāntikaḥ, tathā asyaiva vipakṣe
T11dhnyabpu:3977: rāga ādiryasya dveṣādeḥ sa rāgādiḥ, sa yasyāsti sa rāgādimān iti dvitīyaṃ sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:3980: rāgādimattve vā sādhye prakṛte vaktṛtvam= vacanaśaktiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3985: ato na jñāyateki vaktā sarvajñaḥ? uta asarvajñaḥ?- ityanaikāntikaṃ vaktṛtvam || 69 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3986: 70 sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasyānu palambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena sandehahetutvāt
T11dhnyabpu:3989: 71 vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvācca yaḥ sarvajñaḥsa vaktā na bhavatītya darśane 'pi vyatireko na siddhayati, sandehāt ||
T11dhnyabpu:3991: sarvajñasa vakturdarśane 'pi, adṛśyātmaviṣayeyamanupalabdhiriti adṛśyātmaviṣayatvāt sandehetureva bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:3993: adṛśyaviṣayānupalambhaḥ saṃśayasyaiva heturiti asarvajñaparyayāt sarvajñāt vaktṛtvalakṣaṇahetornivṛttiḥ sandigdhaiva || 70 ||
T11dhnyabpu:3995: svabhāvavirodhopalabdhyā siddhiḥ, syāditi cet? tatrāha- vaktṛtveti |
T11dhnyabpu:3997: tasmāt- sarvajñasya vakturadarśane 'pi vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvād vaktṛtvasya sarvajñatvād
T11dhnyabpu:3999: nanu ca sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate, tat kathaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñe
T11dhnyabpu:4000: sandigdham? ata eva sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasya
T11dhnyabpu:4002: kutaḥ? ityāha- adṛśya ātbhā viṣayo yasya tasya bhāvo 'dṛśyātmaviṣayatvam |
T11dhnyabpu:4007: nānupalambhāt sarvajñe vaktṛtvamasad brūmaḥ, apitu sarvajñatvena saha
T11dhnyabpu:4011: virodhābhāvācca kāraṇāt vyatireko na sidhyati- iti sambandhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4012: vyāptimantaṃ vyatirekaṃ darśayati- yaḥ sarvajña iti |
T11dhnyabpu:4013: sadhyābhāvarūpaṃ sarvajñatvamanūdya sa vaktā na bhavati iti sādhanasya vaktṛtvasyābhāvo vidhīyate
T11dhnyabpu:4014: tena sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyatatvāt sādhanābhāvena vyāpta ukta iti |
T11dhnyabpu:4015: vyāptimānīdṛśo vyatireko virodhe sati vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ sidhyet |
T11dhnyabpu:4022: kathaṃ tayorvirodhābhāva iti cet? tatrāha= dvividha iti |
T11dhnyabpu:4023: yatra yaḥ ko 'pi virodha upalabhyate sa sarva eva prakāradvaye
T11dhnyabpu:4033: kaḥ punarasau dvividho virodhaḥ? ityāha- avikalakāraṇasyeti |
T11dhnyabpu:4034: avikalāni samagrāṇi kāraṇāni yasya sa tathoktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4035: yasya kāraṇavaikalyādabhāvaḥ, na tasya kenacidapi virodhagatiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4037: nanu ca yasyāpi kāraṇasākalpam, tasyāpi nivṛttiraśakyā kenacidapi kartum,
T11dhnyabpu:4038: tat kuto virodhagatiḥ? evaṃ tarhi avikalakaraṇasyāpi yatkṛtāt kāraṇavaikalyādabhāvastena virodhagatiḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4039: tathā ca sati, yo yasya viruddhaḥ sa tasya kiñcitkara |
T11dhnyabpu:4041: śītasparśasya janako bhūtvā śītasparśāntarajananaśakti pratibadhnan śītasparśasya nivartako viruddhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4046: tasmād yo yasya nivartakaḥ sa taṃ yadi paraṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇe nivartayati,
T11dhnyabpu:4047: prathame kṣaṇe sannipatannasamarthavasthādhanayogyo bhavati, dvitīye viruddhamasamartha karoti, tṛtīye tvasamarthe nivṛtte taddeśamākrāmati |
T11dhnyabpu:4048: tatrāloko gatidharmā krameṇa jalataraṅganyāyena deśamākrāman yadāndhakāranirantaramālokakṣaṇaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:4051: asamarthe nivṛtte taddeśe jāyata āloka ityevaṃ krameṇālokenāndhakāro 'paneyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4053: yadā tvālokastatraivāndhakāradeśe janyate, tadā yataḥ kṣaṇādandhakāradeśasyā lokasya janakaḥ kṣaṇa utapdayate, tata evāndhakāro 'ndhakārāntarajananāsamartha
T11dhnyabpu:4056: yathā śītoṣṇasparśayoḥ śītasyāvikalakāraṇasya sato yadā uṣṇatvāpariniṣpattistada śītatvanivṛttiḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4058: parasparaparihāreṇa sthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni parasparaparihārasthitalakṣāṇāni, teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ parasparihāraśitalakṣaṇatā,
T11dhnyabpu:4064: ataśca yasmin kṣaṇe janakaḥ, tatastṛtīye kṣaṇe nivṛtto viruddho yadi śīghraṃ nivartate |
T11dhnyabpu:4066: yadyapi ca na santāno nāma vastu, tathāpi santānino vastubhūtāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4067: tato 'yaṃ paramārthaḥ na kṣaṇayovirodhaḥ, apitu bahūnāṃ kṣaṇānām |
T11dhnyabpu:4068: yataḥ satsu dahanakṣaṇeṣu pravṛttā api śītakṣaṇā nivṛttidharmāṇo bhavantīti santānayornivartyanivartakatvanimitte ca virodhe sthite sarveṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ satyapyekadeśāvasthānābhāve na virodhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4074: kāraṇasāmarthyahetutvakṛtaṃ santānaniṣṭhameva virodhaṃ darśayatā bhavatā iti kṛtam |
T11dhnyabpu:4077: ye tvāhuḥ- na virodho vāstavaḥ iti, ta idaṃ taktavyāḥ- yathā na niṣpanne
T11dhnyabpu:4078: kārye kaścijjanya janakabhāvo nāma dviṣṭho 'sti, kāraṇapūrvikā tu kāryavṛttiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4080: tadvanna nivṛtte vastuni kaścid dviṣṭho nāma virodho 'sti |
T11dhnyabpu:4088: parihāraḥ= parityāgaḥ, tena sthitaṃ lakṣaṇam= rūpaṃ yayoḥv tadbhāvaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4090: 76 sa ca dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorna sambhavati ||
T11dhnyabpu:4092: vaktṛtvasya hi iha yasmin pariccidyamāne yad vyavaccidyate, tat pariccidyamānamaviccadyamānaparihāreṇa sthitarūpaṃ draṣṭavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4093: nīle ca pariccedyamāne tādrūpyapracyutiravaccidyate, tadavyavaccede nīlāpariccedaprasaṅgāt
T11dhnyabpu:4097: yathā ca nīlaṃ svabhāvaṃ pariharati, tadvad abhāvāvyabhicāri pītādikamapīti |
T11dhnyabpu:4098: tathā ca bhāvābhavayoḥ sākṣād virodhaḥ, vastunostvanyonyā bhāvāvyabhicāritvād virodhaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4103: ato na niyatākāram yataḥ kṣaṇikatvaparihāreṇa na kiñcid dṛśyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4106: tato dṛsṭaṃ kalpitaṃ vā niyataṃ rūpamanyatrāsadityavasīyate, nāniyatam |
T11dhnyabpu:4113: ata eva dṛśyamāne rūpe yanniṣidhyate, tad dṛśyamevābhyupagamya niṣidhyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4114: tathā hi- abhāvo 'pi piśāco 'pi yadā pīte niṣedbhūmiṣyate, tadā dṛśyātmataya niṣedhya iti dṛśyatvamabhyupagamya dṛśyānupalabdhereva niṣedhaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4115: tathā ca sati rūpe pariccidyamāna ekasmistadabhāvo dṛśyo vyavaccidyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4119: 'pi vyavaccinnā iti ye parasparaparihārasthitarūpāḥ sarve te 'nena
T11dhnyabpu:4130: sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvaṃ ca sarvajñatvaṃ ca tayorna
T11dhnyabpu:4136: vaktṛtvaparihāreṇāpi sarvajñatvasya na vyavasthitiḥ, nāpi vā sarvajñatvaparihāreṇa vaktṛtvasya vyavasthitiḥ || 76 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4137: virodhābhāve ca aviruddhavadvaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvāvaviparyayeṇopalabhyata iti cet? tatrāha- naceti |
T11dhnyabpu:4138: yatra viruddhatvena nābhidhānaṃ tatra vastunoranupalabdhāvapi nābhāvaniścayaḥ sambhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:4142: astu rāgādivacanayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'siddhaḥ, tataḥ kimiti cet? āha-
T11dhnyabpu:4145: adṛṣṭasya cābhāvo nāvasīyateḥ, tato nānena virodhagatirbhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:4150: syādetat- yadi nāstyeva virodho ghaṭapaṭayoriva, syādapi tayoḥ sahāvasthitidarśanam |
T11dhnyabpu:4159: yato yadi vacanādi rāgādīnāṃ kārya syād, vacanādeḥ rāgādigatiḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4160: rāgādinivṛtto vacanādinivṛttiḥ syāt, na ca kāryam |
T11dhnyabpu:4164: mā bhūd rāgādikāryam, vacanaṃ sahacāri tu bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:4170: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantaroyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:4173: akāraṇasya tasya nivṛttau kathaṃ vacanādernivṛttiḥ syāt? || 79 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4174: tathāhi yasmād vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ ko 'pi virodho nāsti |
T11dhnyabpu:4176: tatmāt asarvajñanivṛttyā rāgādinivṛttyā vā vacananivṛttiḥ sandigdhā |
T11dhnyabpu:4183: sahacāriṇi nivṛtte nivartate vacanam? ityāśaṅkayāha- arthāntarasya cākaraṇasya nivṛtau sahacāritvadarśanamātreṇa nānyasya vacanādenivṛttiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4186: tasmādasarvajñatvaviparyayād vipakṣāt sarvajñatvād rāgādimattvaviparyayādarāgādimattvāt sandigdho vyatireko vacanāde |
T11dhnyabpu:4189: evamekaikarūpādisiddhisandehe hetudoṣān ākhyāya, dvayordvayo rūpayorasiddhisandehe hetudoṣān vaktukāma āha- dvayordvayoriti |
T11dhnyabpu:4191: trīṇi ca rūpāṇi santi, tato viśeṣajñāpanārthamāha- kayodvayoriti || 82 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4192: viśiṣṭe rūpe darśayati- sapakṣe sattvasya, asapakṣe cāsattvasya |
T11dhnyabpu:4196: prayatnāntarīyakaśabdena hi prayatnānantaraṃ janmajñānaṃ ca prayatnānantarīyakamucyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4202: 84 anayoḥ sapakṣe 'sattvam, asapakṣe ca sattvamiti viparyasiddhiḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:4206: yadi kṛtakatvena prayatnāntarīyaktvena vā nityatvaṃ sādhyate, tarhi viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ syāt kathamiha viparyayāsiddhiriti ced? āha- anayoriti |
T11dhnyabpu:4209: tatra tayorubhayoreva sattvam, tathā ca tayoviparyayasiddhiḥ ||
T11dhnyabpu:4219: anitye vipakṣe eva sattvaṃ niścitamiti viparyayasiddhiḥ || 84 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4220: kasmāt punarviparyasiddhavapyetau viruddhau? ityāha- etau ca sādhyasya
T11dhnyabpu:4223: yadi sādhyaviparyayasādhanād viruddhaveto, uktaṃ ca parārthānumāne
T11dhnyabpu:4224: sādhyam, na tvanuktam, iṣṭaṃ cānuktam, ato 'nya iṣṭavighātakṛdābhyāmiti
T11dhnyabpu:4225: darśannāha- nanau ca tṛtīyo 'pi viruddha uktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4231: paro 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ parārthaḥ prayojakaḥ saṃskārya upakartavyo yeṣāṃ te parārthā iti sādhyam
T11dhnyabpu:4247: iṣṭaṃ ca tasya tad asaṃhṛtapārārthya ceti vigrahaḥ, tadviparyayaḥ asaṃhṛtapārārthyaviṣayaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4253: kṛtakatvaprayatnāntarīyakavalakṣaṇaṃ hetunityatve sādhye sādhyaviparyayasādhanād viruddha ityuktam |
T11dhnyabpu:4254: ayamapi sādhyaviparyayasādhanāt tābhyāṃ samāna eva viruddhah || 91 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4256: yataḥ śayanāsanādayaḥ saṅghātarūpāḥ puruṣasya bhogino bhavanti upakārakā iti parārthā ucyante kathamayamiṣṭavighātakṛt? ityāha-
T11dhnyabpu:4262: ātmā asti iti bruvāṇaḥ sāṅkhyaḥ kuta etad iti paryanuyukto bauddhena,
T11dhnyabpu:4266: yasmād yo yasyopakārakaḥ sa tasya janakaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4267: janyamānaśca yugapat krameṇa vā bhavati saṃhṛtaḥ, tasmāt parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃhṛtaparārthā iti siddham || 88
T11dhnyabpu:4268: ayaṃ ca viruddha ācāryadiṅnāgenoktaḥ, sa kasmād vāttikakāreṇa satā tvayā noktaḥ || 89 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4270: nanu ca uktaviparyayaṃ na sādhayati, tat
T11dhnyabpu:4273: yasmād ayam iṣṭavighātakṛd ābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ sādhyaviparyasya sādhanatvena na bhidyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4275: | uktaviparyayaṃ tu sādhayatu vā mā vā, kimuktaviparyayasādhanena tasmādanayoreghāntarbhāvaḥ 92 na hīṣṭoktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścidviśeṣa iti ||
T11dhnyabpu:4277: 94 yathā vītarāgaḥ kaścit sarvajño vā vaktṛtvāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:4283: tasmāt kathamayaṃ tābhyāṃ samāna iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:4285: yacceṣṭaṃ yaccoktaṃ taddvayoḥ sādhyatve viśeṣaḥ ko 'pi nāstītyetaduktameva
T11dhnyabpu:4293: tathā hi sarvajñatve sādhye asarvajño vipakṣaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4296: yasmāt sarvajñatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ cendriyasyāviṣayasyaiva, tasmāt tayoḥ kutrāpi vacanamasti nāsti veti sandigdhameva |
T11dhnyabpu:4297: tathahi- dṛṣṭāntatvena yaḥ puruṣa uktaḥ sa ki sarvajña san vaktā, kimuta asarvajñaḥ san
T11dhnyabpu:4299: nanu ca uktameva sādhyam, tat kathaṃ sādhyaviparyayasādhanetvenābhedaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:4301: yasmādiṣṭoktayoḥ parasparasmāt sādhyatvena na kaścid viśeṣo bheda iti |
T11dhnyabpu:4304: yacca prakaraṇāpannaṃ tat sādhaneccayā viṣayīkṛte sādhyamiṣṭamuktam, anuktaṃ vā, na tūktamātremeva sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4310: vigato rāgo yasya sa vītarāga ityakaṃ sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4315: svātmanyeva sarāge ca asarvajñe ca vipakṣe vaktṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam |
T11dhnyabpu:4319: vacanāderatīndriyagamyasyāpi tatra atīndriyayoḥ sarvajñavītarāgayoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ va sandigdham
T11dhnyabpu:4320: tataśca na jñāyate kiṃ vaktṛtvāt sarvajñaḥ? uta na- ityanaikāntika iti || 95 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4323: 98 na hi sātmakanirātmakābhyāmanyo rāśirasti yatrāyaṃ prāṇādirvarteta ||
T11dhnyabpu:4324: yadyanvayo vyatirekaśca dvāveva sandigdhau, tadāpi anaikāntikahetvābhāsaḥ || 96 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4336: samprati dvayoreva sandehe 'naikāntikaṃ vaktumāha- anayoreva anvayavyatirekayoḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4343: prāṇāḥ= śvāsādaya ādiryasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ prāṇidharmasya sa prāṇādiḥ, sa yasyāsti tat prāṇādimat jīvaccarīram, tasya bhāvastattvam, tasmādityeṣa hetuḥ || 97 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4346: saṃśayaviṣayau yāvākārau, tābhyāṃ sarvasya vastunah saṃgrahāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4348: yābhyāṃ hyākārābhyāṃ sarva vastu na saṃgṛhyate tayorākārayorna saṃśayah |
T11dhnyabpu:4349: prakārāntarasambhave hi pakṣadharmo dharmiṇamaviyuktaṃ dvayorekena dharmeṇa darśayituṃ na śaknuyāt, ato na saṃśayahetuḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4352: niyataṃ tu bhāvaṃ darśayan samyag hetuviruddho vā syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4353: tasmād yabhyāṃ sarva vastu saṃgṛhyate, tayoḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4354: saṃśayahetuḥ, yadi yatorekatrāpi sadbhāvaniścayo na syāt |

T11dhnyabpu:4760: sapakṣa eva yat sattvam, vipakṣācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttiryā- rūpadvayametadabhedenoktam
T11dhnyabpu:4761: naca sāmānyamuktamapi śakyaṃ jñātum, atastadeva viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ vaktavyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4762: ataḥ punarapi viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau
T11dhnyabpu:4764: janmani hi jñāte kāryasya sapakṣe eva
T11dhnyabpu:4773: sādhanasya yadā svabhāvo jñāto bhavati tadā svabhāvahetoḥ- sapakṣe eva sattvam, vipakṣācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttirjñātā bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:4777: tacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā eva darśanīyam- iti sambandhaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4782: darśanīyam, asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4789: sapakṣatvaṃ darśayatā yadi yathā mahānasaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti vā nocyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4791: yadi ca vipakṣāsattvaṃ darśayatā yathā jalam yathā ākāśam iti vā nicyate, tadā vyāvṛttireva noktā syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4795: tasya kārya tatkāryam, tasya bhāvastatkāryatā, tasyā niyamaḥ tatkāryatāniyamaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4796: kāraṇasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam ityeṣa niyama eva tatkāryatāniyamaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4800: yadā yathoktanyāyena kvacid dharmiṇi hetuḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇato viśeṣalakṣaṇataścocyate, tadā dṛṣṭānto 'pyukta eva |
T11dhnyabpu:4804: anityatvābhāve na bhavatyena kṛtakatvamiti vyatireko darśitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4806: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyani vṛttau nivṛttirniyatā darśanīyā |
T11dhnyabpu:4810: yasmādanyathā sāmānya lakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate- sapakṣe eva sattvam, vipakṣa'sattvameveti niyamo yathoktaprakāraḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4812: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre sadasatve darśite bhavataḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4814: tasya sādhyasya kāryadhūmaḥ, tasya bhāvastatkāryatā, saiva niyamo yatastatkāryatāyā dhūmo dahane niyataḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4816: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāpti viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum |
T11dhnyabpu:4817: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvastādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jḥātavyam, tasmād vyāptisādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśayatā sādharmyadṛṣṭānto darśanīyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4823: 124 yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvāt, karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavaditi |
T11dhnyabpu:4828: yatra ca sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo nirdiśyate sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ || 122 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4829: yasmād yadā hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayonirdeśaḥ kriyate sa nirduṣṭhadṛṭānta ityucyate tasmād yatra tallakṣaṇayornirdeśo na sambhavati sa dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati || 123 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4837: tasmād dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa na hetoranvayo vyatireko vā śakyo darśayitum |
T11dhnyabpu:4838: ato heturūpākhyānādeva hetorvyāptisādhanasya pramāṇasya darśakaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4839: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhave hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca darśitaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:4843: etābandhamātraṃ rūpaṃ yasya, tasya bhāvastattvam, tasmāditi |
T11dhnyabpu:4849: etenaiva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntabhāsāḥ kathitā bhavanti
T11dhnyabpu:4850: tathā hi- pūrviktisiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakārya sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmarthyāduktaṃ bhavati || 123 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4853: sādharmyeṇa karmavat, paramāṇuvat, ghaṭavadityete dṛṣṭāntā upanyastāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4861: yathā- yo vaktā sa rāgādimān iṣṭapuruṣavat |
T11dhnyabpu:4877: tena tatra vacanarāgādayorvyāpyavyapakabhavaḥ kārya kāraṇabhāvo vā naiva vidyate |
T11dhnyabpu:4888: tathā sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4896: maraṇe dharmo 'syeti maraṇadharmā, tasya bhāvo maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4904: apradarśitānvayaśca yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'pyanvayo na pradarśito vaktrā, so 'pradarśitānvayaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4911: anvayo viparīto yasmin dṛṣṭānte iti vigrahaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4913: iha yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iryāmadheye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakam iti viparītābhidhānam || 127
T11dhnyabpu:4924: iha yadyapi kṛtakatvena ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdaḥ, tathāpi nānityatvenāpi sadṛśaḥ pratyetu śakyate, atiprasaṅgāt |
T11dhnyabpu:4925: yadi tu kṛtakatvamanityasvabhavaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati, evaṃ kṛtakatvādanityatvapratītiḥ syāt
T11dhnyabpu:4926: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tadani tyam iti kṛtakatvamanityatve niyatamabhidhāya niyamasadhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4929: īddaśaśca sādharmyamāṭreṇaivopayogī, na ca sādharmyāt sādhyasiddhirato
T11dhnyabpu:4933: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭāṃ vastu, tathāpi vaktrā duṣṭāṃ darśitatamiti duṣṭameva || 126 ||
T11dhnyabpu:4934: tathā viparīto 'nvayo yasmin dṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4940: tato yādṛśamiha kṛtakatvamaniyata manityatve darśitam, tādṛśānnāstyanityatvapratītiḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:4941: tathāhi- yadanityamityanityatvamanūdaya tat kṛtakamiti kṛtakatvaṃ vihitam |
T11dhnyabpu:4942: ato 'nityatvaṃ niyatamuktaṃ kṛtakatve, na tu kṛtakatvamanityatve |
T11dhnyabpu:4944: prayatnānantarīyakatvapratītiḥ, tadvat kṛtakatvādanityatvapratipattirna syāt, anityatve 'niyatatvāt kṛtakatvasya |
T11dhnyabpu:4945: yadyapi ca kṛtakatvaṃ vastusthityānityatve niyatam, tathāpyaniyataṃ vaktra darśitam |
T11dhnyabpu:4958: te ca yatra santi te sādhyādyavaytirekiṇah |
T11dhnyabpu:4972: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāvamūrtatve paramāṇuvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī nityatvāt paramāṇūnām karma sādhanāvyatireki |
T11dhnyabpu:4981: sandigdhaḥ sādhyavyatireko yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyavyatirekaḥ, sa ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ
T11dhnyabpu:4983: asarvajñā ityekaṃ sādhyam, anāptā akṣīṇadoṣā iti dvitīyam |
T11dhnyabpu:4986: āptatā ca tayorliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇatiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣo 'vidayamānaḥ sarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo yasmin tathoktaṃ śāsanam |
T11dhnyabpu:4987: tādṛśaṃ śāsanaṃ teṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ teṣāṃ bhāvastattvam |
T11dhnyabpu:4994: sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā- na trayīvidā rāmhaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvaditi |
T11dhnyabpu:4996: sarvajñatva ca vītarāgatvaṃ sarvajñatvavītarāgatve, tayoliṅgabhūtaṃ pramāṇātiśayaśāsanamavidhyamānaṃ yeṣu te
T11dhnyabpu:5002: tasmāt te sarvajñā vītarāgā veti niścetuṃ śakyata iti |
T11dhnyabpu:5003: atra ṛṣabhamahāvīrādivaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ukta, teṣu ca asarvajñatvāvītarāgatvayorvyatirekaniścayo nāsti || 130 ||
T11dhnyabpu:5007: hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āptā vā syuḥ, tadā jyotirjñānādikaṃ kasmānno
T11dhnyabpu:5008: padiṣṭāvantaḥ? na copadiṣṭāvantaḥ, tasmānna sarvajñā āptā vā |
T11dhnyabpu:5010: vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptataliṅgabhūtamupadiṣṭāvān
T11dhnyabpu:5011: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaśca tāvādī yasya sa ṛṣabhvardhamānādirdigambarāṇāṃ śāstā sarvajñaśca āptaśceti |
T11dhnyabpu:5012: tadiha vaidharmyodāharaṇam ṛṣabhāderasarvajñatvasyanāptatayāśca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā
T11dhnyabpu:5013: yato jyotirjñānaṃ copadiśet, asarvajñaśca bhaved anāptā vā |
T11dhnyabpu:5016: sandigdhaḥ sādhanavyatireko yasmin sa tathoktaḥ? tamudāharati- yatheti |
T11dhnyabpu:5017: ṛksāmayajūṣi trīṇi= trayī, tāṃ vettīti trayīvit |
T11dhnyabpu:5018: tena na grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam |
T11dhnyabpu:5022: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharyodaharaṇam
T11dhnyabpu:5023: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttimanūdaya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5024: gauramaraṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ, tadayathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti |
T11dhnyabpu:5028: atra vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yo vītarāgo na tasya
T11dhnyabpu:5036: tenatadukta bhavati- trayīvid yo brāmhaṇastadabhimatapuruṣavacanaṃ nityapramāṇaṃ nāstīti |
T11dhnyabpu:5039: ye hi grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5041: | gautama vyāsamuniprabhṛttibhiryāni dharmaśāstrāṇi praṇītāniv tāni hi
T11dhnyabpu:5050: ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktā manbādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi= smṛtayasteṣāṃ kartāraḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5051: trayīvidā hi brāmhaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāśca ta ītīha dharmī vyatirekaviṣayo gautamādaya iti |
T11dhnyabpu:5053: yadyapi te grāhyavacanāstrayīvidā, tathapi ki sarāgā uta vītarāgāḥ? iti sandehaḥ || 131 ||
T11dhnyabpu:5060: svīkārādūrdhva yad gārdhya mātsarya sa āgrahaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5061: parigrahaśca āgrahaśca tabhyāṃ yogāt kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkurvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante |
T11dhnyabpu:5062: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yatra sāhdyābhāva sādhanābhavo darśayitavyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:5064: sādhyābhāvamanūdaya na tasya parigrahāgrahāviti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5066: etasmād ṛṣabhādedṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyaparigrahāgrahayogasya ca sādhanasya nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā |
T11dhnyabpu:5070: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā |yathā upalakhaṇḍa iti |
T11dhnyabpu:5071: yadayapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtaṃ tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddheravyatirekaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:5072: 134 arpadarśitavyatireko yathā- anitya śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvādākāśavat iti vaidharmyeṇa ||
T11dhnyabpu:5073: ṛṣabhādayo hi svalpamatramapi vyañjanaṃ na parigṛhṇanti |
T11dhnyabpu:5079: te ca sarve mānasattvāt indriyagocarā na bhavanti |
T11dhnyabpu:5080: tasmāt ṛṣabhādibhyo vyāvṛttireveti niścetuṃ na śakyate || 132 ||
T11dhnyabpu:5087: yadyapi upalakhaṇḍasyācetanatvādrāgādimattvaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ vā naiva, tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptirasiddhā |
T11dhnyabpu:5093: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāśca niṣparigrahāśca paṭhayante, tathāpi sandeha eva || 132
T11dhnyabpu:5094: aparānapi trīnudāhartumāha- avyatireka it avidyamāno vyatireko yasmin so
T11dhnyabpu:5104: kathamayamavyatireko yāvatopalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ nivṛtam? kimataḥ? yadyapi upalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyavṛttam- sarāgatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ ca tathāpi vyaptyā vyatireko
T11dhnyabpu:5106: kīdṛśī punarvyāptiḥ? ityaha- sarvo vītarāga iti |
T11dhnyabpu:5116: kenacid vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntatvena śabdo 'nitya kṛtakatvāt, ākāśavat ityukta,
T11dhnyabpu:5118: tathāhi yadi ye ye ca apdārthā nityāḥ te sarva evākṛtakāḥ ityucyate, tadā vyatireko darśito
T11dhnyabpu:5127: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāvad yathā prakāśitastathā na yuktaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:5130: ato vakturaparādhādapi parāthānumāne heturdṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭāḥ syādapi |
T11dhnyabpu:5133: ataḥ sādhyaniyato heturanvayavākyena, vyatirekavākyena vā vaktavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5138: prayuktam, ato vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ihāsādṛśaymātreṇa sādhaka upanyastaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5140: vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ na ca tathopanyasta iti ayamapradarśitavyatireko vakturaparādhād duṣṭāḥ || 134
T11dhnyabpu:5141: viparīto vyatireko yasmin vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5145: heturdaśayitavyaḥ, yadā ca sādhyaniyato heturdarhsayitavyaḥ, tadā vyatirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5146: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt |
T11dhnyabpu:5147: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate, sādhanasattāyāmapi sādhyābhvaḥ sambhāvyeta
T11dhnyabpu:5148: tathā ca sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta |
T11dhnyabpu:5150: viparītavyatireke ca sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate, na sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanā bhāve
T11dhnyabpu:5155: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatamuktam, na nityatvaṃ sādhanābhāve |
T11dhnyabpu:5157: 136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:5158: vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
T11dhnyabpu:5164: taiśca dṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoyacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tacca na śakyate darśayitum
T11dhnyabpu:5165: tata eva te dṛṣṭāntābhāsā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ
T11dhnyabpu:5166: yasmād dvividhamapi hetirlakṣaṇaṃ darśayituṃ na śakyate, tasmādarthāpattyā teṣāṃ nirāso draṣṭavyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:5174: 'neti uktiḥ= vacanam| yena vacanena dosā uddhriyante tad dūṣaṇamiti |
T11dhnyabpu:5179: ebhiśca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayitum |
T11dhnyabpu:5180: nanu ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaniyatameva pratipattavyam, na svata eva?
T11dhnyabpu:5194: 138 ye pūrva nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt
T11dhnyabpu:5198: yasmāttena vacanena pūrvapakṣiṇā sādhayitumiṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ pratibadhyate, tasmāt tad dūṣaṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:5201: kāśca punastā jātaya iti? āha- abhūteti |
T11dhnyabpu:5202: na bhūto 'bhūtaḥ, abhūtā doṣā abhūtadoṣāḥ teṣāmudbhavanāni abhūtadoṣodbhāvanāni |
T11dhnyabpu:5203: yaiśca vacanaiḥ sādhanadoṣā abidhyamānā api udbhāvyante tāni jātayo veditavyāḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5205: ucyate, dūṣaṇānāṃ tayā dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ ca nirūpaṇe samyagjñānamapi
T11dhnyabpu:5207: tathā caitā hyatra dūṣaṇā iti tāsāṃ pariharo vidheyaḥ |
T11dhnyabpu:5208: yadā vā ete dūṣaṇābhāsāḥ, etebhyaḥ śaṅkābhāva eva
T11dhnyabpu:5209: veditavya ityabhidhīyate, tadā samyagjñānameva sarvathā nirūpitaṃ bhavati |
T11dhnyabpu:5212: uktāḥ, teṣāmudbhāvakaṃ yad vacanaṃ tad dūṣaṇam |
T11dhnyabpu:5213: nanu ca nyūnatādayo na viparyayasādhanāḥ, tat kathaṃ dūṣaṇam? ityāha- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣāmiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ, tasyāḥ pratibandhāt |
T11dhnyabpu:5214: nāvaśyaṃ viparyayasādhanādeva dūṣaṇaṃ viruddhavat, api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhānniścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya
T11dhnyabpu:5228: pṛthu yaccājitaṃ puṇyaṃ nyāyabidoḥ padaṃ padam |
T11dhnyabpu:5244: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hayavadat |
T11dhnyabpu:5245: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
